original: mi g-yo ba'i las ni 'dod pa'i khams su rnam par smin par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sa de las las kyi rnam par smin pa so so mi g-yo ba'i yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i las ni 'dod pa'i khams su rnam par smin par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir sa de las las kyi rnam par smin pa so so mi g-yo ba'i yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The karma of the immovable is not karmic maturation in the desire realm because it is said that the karmic maturation of karma on that level is immovable.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i rnam par smin pa'i sems yin par mi srid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i rnam par smin pa'i sems yin par mi srid do //
translated: Therefore it is impossible that the mind of the summit meditative attainment is the karmic maturation of the karma of one born in the desire realm.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa po rnams ni ci dgar byar yod pa yang yin pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod na de mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir dang / sngar smon lam btab pa bzhin ldang ba'i dus mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa po rnams ni ci dgar byar yod pa yang yin pas zhes bya ba ni 'dod na de mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir dang / sngar smon lam btab pa bzhin ldang ba'i dus mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And those who enter that meditative attainment can do whatever they want, because they can manifest it whenever they want and because they can control the time of arising, in accordance with their previous aspiration.

original: mig la sogs pa rnam par smin pa la ni chos 'di dag ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnam par smin pa la ni chos 'di dag ma mthong ngo //
translated: These characteristics are not seen in the karmic maturation of the eye, etc.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pas 'thob pa yin la /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pas 'thob pa yin la /
translated: The meditative attainment of cessation is obtained by those who experience the desire realm.

original: de'i rnam par smin pa'i sems ni 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa'i sems ni 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mind of its karmic maturation belongs to the desire realm.🔽How can that mental formation be possible without contact?

original: sems mngon par 'du byed pa de yang reg pa med par ji ltar rung zhes bya ba zhi de la yid la byed pa dag sems pa yang yod do //
analyzed: sems mngon par 'du byed pa de yang reg pa med par ji ltar rung zhes bya ba zhi de la yid la byed pa dag sems pa yang yod do //
translated: In that meditative attainment, there is also the intention of attention.

original: mdo sde gzhan las gang ci yang rung 'du byed kyi phung po de thams cad ni rig pa la brten nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo sde gzhan las gang ci yang rung 'du byed kyi phung po de thams cad ni rig pa la brten nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said in another sūtra, “Whatever is the aggregate of formation, all of that is based on cognition.”

original: gal te yang de'i tshe yid kyi rnam par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa gzhan zhig yin par rnam par rtog par byed na zhes bya ba la gzhan gzhig ces bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan du'o //
analyzed: gal te yang de'i tshe yid kyi rnam par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa gzhan zhig yin par rnam par rtog par byed na zhes bya ba la gzhan gzhig ces bya ba ni rnam pa gzhan du'o //
translated: another means different.

original: ji skad du /🔽rnam bzhir ma gtogs rnam smin min //
analyzed: ji skad du / rnam bzhir ma gtogs rnam smin min //
translated: As it is said:

original: mngon par 'du byed 'jug pa min //🔽zhes bya ba /🔽chos mngon lugs la ma brten lung ma bstan //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed 'jug pa min // zhes bya ba / chos mngon lugs la ma brten lung ma bstan //
translated: It is not karmic maturation, not included in the four.🔽It is not the entry of formation.

original: rnam bzhir ma bstan thub pa'i sa //
analyzed: rnam bzhir ma bstan thub pa'i sa //
translated: It is not neutral in the Abhidharma system.

original: zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bstan to //
translated: The Muni did not teach it as neutral.

original: sems las su rung zhing sems mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ji ltar dmigs pa dang / rnam pa'i g-yeng ba byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems las su rung zhing sems mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ji ltar dmigs pa dang / rnam pa'i g-yeng ba byed par 'gyur /
translated: How could a flexible mind abiding in signless concentration be distracted by an object or aspect?

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du gyur par @119a * //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems mngon du gyur par @119a * //
translated: If you say that neutral minds manifest,

original: 'dod pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la de ltar sems las su rung ba de lta bu ni gang de ma thag tu 'du shes dang tshor ba kun du byung ba ldog par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la de ltar sems las su rung ba de lta bu ni gang de ma thag tu 'du shes dang tshor ba kun du byung ba ldog par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Thus, the mind that is pliable in this way is the one in which the occurrence of discernment and feeling is immediately stopped.

original: sems mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la dmigs shing sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la dmigs shing sems ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The mind that is situated in the concentration of signlessness is one that has as its object the cessation of discernment and feeling and is situated in concentration.

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i g-yeng ba zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i zhi ba'i rnam pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i g-yeng ba zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i zhi ba'i rnam pa yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The “distraction of the object and its aspect” is the relinquishment of the aspect of peace that has as its object the cessation of discernment and feeling.

original: gal te 'gog pa dang zhi pa'i rnam pa la dmigs pa nyid yin na ni lung du ma bstan pa yin par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'gog pa dang zhi pa'i rnam pa la dmigs pa nyid yin na ni lung du ma bstan pa yin par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If it has as its object the aspect of cessation and the aspect of peace, then it would not be indeterminate.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it, then?

original: dge ba yin no //
analyzed: dge ba yin no //
translated: It is virtuous.

original: 'dod pa yang ma yin zhes smos pa ni gal te dmigs pa rnam pa'i g-yeng ba 'dod par gyur na sems g-yengs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa yang ma yin zhes smos pa ni gal te dmigs pa rnam pa'i g-yeng ba 'dod par gyur na sems g-yengs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The phrase “nor is it desired” means that if the distraction of the objective mental activity were desired, then the mind would not be distracted.

original: nyes par byas pa ni g-yengs pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: nyes par byas pa ni g-yengs pa zhes brjod do //
translated: A fault is called a distraction.

original: de ltar rigs pas sems thams cad yongs su bkag nas lung gis kyang ston pa ni rnam pa gang gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa la yod pa ma🔽yin nas gzhan ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar rigs pas sems thams cad yongs su bkag nas lung gis kyang ston pa ni rnam pa gang gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa la yod pa ma yin nas gzhan ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, having refuted all minds by reasoning, he now presents scripture, saying, “In no way whatsoever is there a mental consciousness of the base of neither-perception-nor-non-perception in the meditative attainment of cessation, much less in other states.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhes rgya cher 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhes rgya cher 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The Bhagavat also says,🔽“In no way whatsoever is there a mental consciousness of the base of neither-perception-nor-non-perception in the meditative attainment of cessation, much less in other states.”

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gi sgo nas kyang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gi sgo nas kyang /
translated: In no way whatsoever means in no way whatsoever.

original: de'i tshe ni de'i sa pa'i sems mngon du byed pa ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni de'i sa pa'i sems mngon du byed pa ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: This shows that at that time the mind of that level is not manifest.

original: lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnams la med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnams la med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: This means that it is not nonexistent for nonreturners who have obtained the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du 'dod chags dang bral nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du 'dod chags dang bral nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das pa ma yin pas so //
translated: Because they are not utterly free from attachment to the summit of existence, they do not transcend the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment.🔽Here the root text states,🔽The formless realm is threefold.🔽The formless realm is threefold:🔽The base of infinite space,

original: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa ji lta ba de'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa ji lta ba de'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the base of infinite consciousness,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /🔽de ni gzhan zhig yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / de ni gzhan zhig yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and the base of nothingness.

original: srid rtse'i mtshan nyid 'du shes med //🔽ces rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: srid rtse'i mtshan nyid 'du shes med // ces rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment is the summit of existence.🔽The base of infinite space is the meditative attainment of the base of infinite space.🔽The base of infinite consciousness is the meditative attainment of the base of infinite consciousness.

original: srid rtse'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
analyzed: srid rtse'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
translated: The base of nothingness is the meditative attainment of the base of nothingness.

original: 'du shes med 'du shes med pa min nyid 'dod ces bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med pa min nyid 'dod ces bya ba yin te /
translated: The base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment is the meditative attainment of the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment.🔽The summit of existence is the meditative attainment of the summit of existence.

original: 'di 'du shes med 'du shes med min yin pas @119b 'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min no //
analyzed: 'di 'du shes med 'du shes med min yin pas @119b 'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min no //
translated: This is neither perception nor non-perception, thus it is neither perception nor non-perception.

original: de'i dngos po ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min nyid do //
translated: Its state is the state of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'dod pa ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'dod pa ci zhe na /
translated: What is the point?

original: skabs kyi mtshan nyid la bsams pa'o //
analyzed: skabs kyi mtshan nyid la bsams pa'o //
translated: The characteristic of the context is intended.

original: 'gog la de yi sa sems med //
analyzed: 'gog la de yi sa sems med //
translated: There is no mind in cessation, nor in its state.

original: ces bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'gog pa de la 'du shes med 'du shes med min de na yod pa'i de'i sa sems med do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'gog pa de la 'du shes med 'du shes med min de na yod pa'i de'i sa sems med do //
translated: In the attainment of cessation, there is no mind in that cessation, nor in its state of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: ji ltar 'gags she na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gags she na /
translated: How is it ceased?

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba gnyis 'gags pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba gnyis 'gags pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because both perception and feeling are ceased.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa'i sems med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa'i sems med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means there is no mind of the peak of existence.

original: don mtshon pa'i phyir de dag brtag par byas te /
analyzed: don mtshon pa'i phyir de dag brtag par byas te /
translated: They are investigated for the purpose of indicating the meaning.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa bsam gtan bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa bsam gtan bzhin no //
translated: They are like the four dhyanas with discursive thought and investigation.

original: de'i phyir 'gags su zin kyang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gags su zin kyang srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yod do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, though it has ceased, the mental consciousness of the summit of existence exists.🔽If that is so, then it would contradict the sutra that states:

original: 'o na ni rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te zhes 'byung ba'i mdo sde dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te zhes 'byung ba'i mdo sde dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Completely transcending the base of neither discernment nor nondiscernment.

original: 'di ni thams cad du yang yang dag par 'das pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad du yang yang dag par 'das pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It does not completely transcend all states of existence,🔽but it does completely transcend the summit of existence.

original: des na de ni gzhan zhig yin te /
analyzed: des na de ni gzhan zhig yin te /
translated: Therefore it is different from the summit of existence.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo de'i sems mi srid pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems dang bcas pa yin pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de dag gis na /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo de'i sems mi srid pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems dang bcas pa yin pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin pa de dag gis na /
translated: The reasonings that prove that mind does not exist in the summit of existence and that the meditative attainment of cessation possesses mind prove that the meditative attainment of nonperception is different from the summit of existence.

original: des na de ni gzhan zhig yin te /
analyzed: des na de ni gzhan zhig yin te /
translated: Therefore it is different from the summit of existence.

original: sems de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin no //
analyzed: sems de ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin no //
translated: That mind is foundation consciousness.

original: ji ltar yid kyi bag chags la yang ming yid ces lan 'ga' brjod de zhes bya ba ni sems med pa'i gnas skabs las ldang ba'i tshe 'bras bus rgyu 'dogs pa yod do //
analyzed: ji ltar yid kyi bag chags la yang ming yid ces lan 'ga' brjod de zhes bya ba ni sems med pa'i gnas skabs las ldang ba'i tshe 'bras bus rgyu 'dogs pa yod do //
translated: Just as the latent impressions of mind are sometimes called “mind,” so too the latent impressions of action are called “action.”

original: de bas na ji ltar las kyi bag chags la yang las zhes bya ba dang / gang gi tshe las kyi rnam par smin pa zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa ni dngos su las kyis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar las kyi bag chags la yang las zhes bya ba dang / gang gi tshe las kyi rnam par smin pa zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa ni dngos su las kyis ma yin gyi /
translated: When the result is designated by the cause, as in the case of “the latent impressions of action are called ‘action,’” and “the ripening of action is called ‘action,’” the ripening is not actually action.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: de ni bag chags kyis yin no //
analyzed: de ni bag chags kyis yin no //
translated: It is the latent impressions.

original: de'i phyir / rnam par rtog pa 'di la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon rgyud gnyis la yod par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rgyud tha dad pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rnam par rtog pa 'di la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon rgyud gnyis la yod par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rgyud tha dad pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, in this theory, the seed of the mental consciousness would exist in two continuities, like the two mental consciousnesses in different continuities.

original: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du byas te /
analyzed: sems dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbang du byas te /
translated: This is from the point of view of the state in which there is mind.

original: de skad bstan gyi sems med pa las ldang ba'i tshe ni sems kyi rgyud nyid yod pa ma yin na de gnas pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon lta ga la yod de /
analyzed: de skad bstan gyi sems med pa las ldang ba'i tshe ni sems kyi rgyud nyid yod pa ma yin na de gnas pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon lta ga la yod de /
translated: But when one arises from the mindless meditative attainment, the mindstream itself does not exist, so how could there be a seed of the mental consciousness?

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyi rgyun gyi dbye ba brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i sa bon gyi rgyun gyi dbye ba brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: The continuum of the seed of the mental consciousness should not be investigated.🔽Why does the mind arise from one sense faculty and not from another?

original: @120a * // ci'i phyir gcig las 'byung ba de'i tshe cig shos las ma yin zhes bya ba de ni bdag po'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang rgyu'i rkyen dag yod na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: @120a * // ci'i phyir gcig las 'byung ba de'i tshe cig shos las ma yin zhes bya ba de ni bdag po'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang rgyu'i rkyen dag yod na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: This is because the dominant condition, objective condition, and causal condition exist.

original: 'on te de ma thag pa'i rkyen gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na de la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /🔽'o na ni sems med pa'i gnas skabs las ldang ba 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te de ma thag pa'i rkyen gcig yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na de la 'di skad brjod par bya ste / 'o na ni sems med pa'i gnas skabs las ldang ba 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If you say that it is because there is only one immediately preceding condition, then this should be said to you:

original: de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Well then, arising from a mindless state would not be established because the immediately preceding condition does not exist.

original: 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen du 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gags nas yun ring du lon pa ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen du 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: A mind that has long ceased does not establish the immediately preceding condition.

original: gal te yang rnam par shes pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi dbang po la yang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la ;🔽de yang bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dbang po de la yang /
analyzed: gal te yang rnam par shes pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du lus kyi dbang po la yang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la ; de yang bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dbang po de la yang /
translated: If consciousness is like this, then the body faculty is also like this, etc.🔽Moreover, it is due to the formative forces of merit, etc.

original: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that the body faculty is also due to the formative forces of merit, demerit, and immobility.

original: rnam par shes pa nyi tshe la 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyi tshe la 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis zhes brjod par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would not be correct to say that consciousness alone is conditioned by the formative forces.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis lus kyi dbang po yang yin no zhes brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis lus kyi dbang po yang yin no zhes brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be necessary to say that the body faculty is also conditioned by the formative forces.

original: rnam par shes pa nyi tshe ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ci zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyi tshe ba'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ci zhe na /
translated: What is name-and-form conditioned by the limited consciousness?

original: brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not to be expressed.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: lus kyi dbang po la yang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po la yang brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the body sense faculty.🔽Why is it taught that only the mind needs the formative forces of merit,

original: sems nyi tshe la yang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed dgos par ci'i phyir bstan /
analyzed: sems nyi tshe la yang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'du byed dgos par ci'i phyir bstan /
translated: demerit, etc.?

original: lus kyi dbang po yang de la ming dang gzugs de la mthu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po yang de la ming dang gzugs de la mthu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the body sense faculty has power over that name-and-form.

original: gang yang 'di skad ces bya ba nas rgyas par byas nas /
analyzed: gang yang 'di skad ces bya ba nas rgyas par byas nas /
translated: Also, in some sūtras it is said:🔽“The body is cultivated and the body is not cultivated.”🔽The body is cultivated from the point of view of the cultivation of faith, morality, learning, generosity and wisdom.🔽The body is not cultivated from the point of view of the non-cultivation of faith, morality, learning, generosity and wisdom.

original: dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab yongs su bsgos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par 'byung ba dang / kha cig las lus bsgoms pa dang / lus ma bsgoms pa zhes bstan pa ni de rnam par bsgom pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab yongs su bsgos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par 'byung ba dang / kha cig las lus bsgoms pa dang / lus ma bsgoms pa zhes bstan pa ni de rnam par bsgom pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: The body is cultivated and the body is not cultivated from the point of view of the cultivation and non-cultivation of the body itself.

original: lus 'di la skra dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: lus 'di la skra dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The body is cultivated from the point of view of the cultivation of the body itself.🔽The body is not cultivated from the point of view of the non-cultivation of the body itself.

original: de ltar re zhig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi rgyun la bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos shing 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin par mi srid par bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi rgyun la bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos shing 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin par mi srid par bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the stream of the six collections of consciousness is perfumed by the formations of merit, etc., and it is established that consciousness is the condition for the formations.

original: gzhan dag na re 'du byed kyi @120b rkyen gyis ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re 'du byed kyi @120b rkyen gyis ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin te /
translated: Others say that the condition of the formations is the consciousness that links to the next existence in the womb.

original: ji skad du chos mngon pa'i mdzod las /
analyzed: ji skad du chos mngon pa'i mdzod las /
translated: As the Abhidharmakośa states,

original: mtshams sbyor phung bo'i rnam par shes //
analyzed: mtshams sbyor phung bo'i rnam par shes //
translated: The consciousness that links to the next existence is a heap of formations.

original: zhes smras pa dang / de ltar ni rgyu'i rnam grangs chen po las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhes smras pa dang / de ltar ni rgyu'i rnam grangs chen po las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The great enumeration of causes is stated extensively in this way.

original: de ltar ni zhes bya ba ni de bas na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes bya ba ni de bas na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “in this way” is “therefore.”

original: mdo sde 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di dang 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: This contradicts this sūtra.

original: de bas na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin par grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin par grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore it is established that the condition of the formations is the consciousness that links to the next existence in the womb.

original: gang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis mngal du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin te zhes smras pa de'i khungs su 'di mi rung ste /
analyzed: gang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis mngal du nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin te zhes smras pa de'i khungs su 'di mi rung ste /
translated: The source of the statement, “It is the consciousness that is conditioned by karmic formations and enters the womb,” is not appropriate.

original: gal te cha 'di kho na la ;
analyzed: gal te cha 'di kho na la ;
translated: If this part alone

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ma yin na ni ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ma yin na ni ma'i mngal du 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: were not the consciousness conditioned by karmic formations, then it would not enter the mother’s womb.

original: mdo sde dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di'i lan ni kha cig na re 'gal ba med de zhes rgyas par smras pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo sde dang 'gal bar 'gyur zhes smras pa gang yin pa 'di'i lan ni kha cig na re 'gal ba med de zhes rgyas par smras pa yin no //
translated: The response to the objection that this contradicts the sutras is the statement, “There is no contradiction,” and so on.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ni ji ltar rigs par na nying mtshams sbyor ba yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ni ji ltar rigs par na nying mtshams sbyor ba yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The consciousness conditioned by karmic formations is the linking consciousness, as is appropriate.

original: ji snyed yod na ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa de na yod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji snyed yod na ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa de na yod pa yin no //
translated: If it exists, then mental consciousness exists there.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rnam par 'jog pa na ji snyed yod pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni mngal du gzugs gang srid pa de kho na der rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs rnam par 'jog pa na ji snyed yod pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni mngal du gzugs gang srid pa de kho na der rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: When name-and-form is posited as the condition of consciousness, it is posited as all that exists.

original: mig la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the eye faculty and so on are not posited as name-and-form.🔽When name-and-form exists in the womb, it is posited as name-and-form.

original: gnas skabs de na gzugs gang yin pa de thams cad ces rgyas par 'byung ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs de na yang /
analyzed: gnas skabs de na gzugs gang yin pa de thams cad ces rgyas par 'byung ba ni ming dang gzugs kyi gnas skabs de na yang /
translated: When name-and-form exists in that state, all form is the four great elements and form derived from the four great elements.🔽What is form?

original: gzugs gang yin pa de thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang de dag rgyur byas pa'o zhes gzugs gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs gang yin pa de thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang de dag rgyur byas pa'o zhes gzugs gang zhe na /
translated: All that is derived from the four great elements and the four great elements themselves.🔽This is the correct explanation of the term name-and-form.🔽But when consciousness enters the womb, it is not the sixfold collection of consciousness.

original: de thams cad ces rgyas par ji ltar bstan pa ni rigs pa yin gyi nying mtshams sbyor ba na rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni ma yin pas 'dir chos 'dra ba ci yod /
analyzed: de thams cad ces rgyas par ji ltar bstan pa ni rigs pa yin gyi nying mtshams sbyor ba na rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ni ma yin pas 'dir chos 'dra ba ci yod /
translated: What is the similarity between the two?

original: gzhan dag yang mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i lan smra ba /
analyzed: gzhan dag yang mdo sde dang 'gal ba'i lan smra ba /
translated: Others respond to this by saying that this explanation contradicts the sūtras.

original: de las gzhan la bstan pa yang skye mched drug gi bar du zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan la bstan pa yang skye mched drug gi bar du zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The extensive explanation continues up to the statement:

original: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na 'du byed kyi rkyen can yin no //
analyzed: nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na 'du byed kyi rkyen can yin no //
translated: The consciousness at conception alone is conditioned by karmic formation.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa ni skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /🔽rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi mtshan nyid kyis ni skye mched drug la skye @121a * //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa ni skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir te / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug gi mtshan nyid kyis ni skye mched drug la skye @121a * //
translated: The sixfold collection of consciousness is mentioned in order to demonstrate that it is engaged by karma up to the six sense spheres.

original: mched drug gi 'bras bu dang bral ba ma yin par bstan la /
analyzed: mched drug gi 'bras bu dang bral ba ma yin par bstan la /
translated: The six sense spheres are not divorced from the result of the sixfold collection of consciousness because they are characterized by the sixfold collection of consciousness.

original: de dang ma bral ba yang las kyis byas pa yin pas skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: de dang ma bral ba yang las kyis byas pa yin pas skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan to //
translated: And since they are not divorced from that, they are engaged by karma up to the six sense spheres because they are created by karma.

original: de smos pa don med de zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa don med pa yin te /
analyzed: de smos pa don med de zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni skye mched drug gi bar du las kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin par bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa don med pa yin te /
translated: The extensive explanation: “It is meaningless to mention it” is that it is meaningless to mention the six collections of consciousness in order to demonstrate that the six sense bases are engaged by karma.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa med par yang las kyi bye brag gis rnam par shes pa bye brag tu 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug smos pa med par yang las kyi bye brag gis rnam par shes pa bye brag tu 'gyur /
translated: Even without mentioning the six collections of consciousness, consciousness is differentiated by the specificities of karma.

original: de'i bye brag las ming dang gzugs bye brag tu 'gyur ming dang gzugs kyi bye brag las skye mched drug bye brag tu 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bye brag las ming dang gzugs bye brag tu 'gyur ming dang gzugs kyi bye brag las skye mched drug bye brag tu 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: From the specificities of consciousness, name and form are differentiated and from the specificities of name and form, the six sense bases are differentiated.

original: ji ltar bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bstan zhe na /
translated: How is this taught?

original: de rkyen du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rkyen du bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is taught as a condition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that reason,

original: gal te bye brag gis de bye brag tu mi 'gyur na ni ji ltar snga ma ni phyi ma'i rkyen du 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes smras pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te bye brag gis de bye brag tu mi 'gyur na ni ji ltar snga ma ni phyi ma'i rkyen du 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes smras pa yin te /
translated: if it were not differentiated by specificities, how could it be established as the condition of the later?

original: de ltar mi 'dod na ni yan lag snga ma ni yan lag can phyi ma'i rkyen du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar mi 'dod na ni yan lag snga ma ni yan lag can phyi ma'i rkyen du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If you do not accept this, then the former member would not be the condition of the latter member.

original: rkyen gyi bye brag las rkyen dang ldan pa bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rkyen gyi bye brag las rkyen dang ldan pa bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the one possessing the conditions does not differ due to the difference in the conditions.

original: gal te 'di'i don mi 'jug pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de'o //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i don mi 'jug pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de'o //
translated: If you say that the meaning of this is that it does not enter, then that refers to the consciousness that links with the embryo.

original: skye bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: skye bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: The consciousness that links with birth🔽is not reasonable as entering the mother’s womb.

original: ma'i mngal du 'jug par rigs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni ma zhugs pa ni 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i zhugs pa de ni ma'i mngal du zhugs zin pa yin pas zhugs pa yin na ji ltar 'jug pa
analyzed: ma'i mngal du 'jug par rigs pa ma yin te zhes bya ba ni ma zhugs pa ni 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i zhugs pa de ni ma'i mngal du zhugs zin pa yin pas zhugs pa yin na ji ltar 'jug pa
translated: That which has not entered is directed toward entering, and that which is entering is called “entering.” But if it has already entered the mother’s womb, then how could it be entering?

original: zhes bya ba 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis ma'i mngal du 'jug pa yin par rigs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis ma'i mngal du 'jug pa yin par rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the consciousness that is suffused by karmic action enters the mother’s womb through the continuum of the intermediate existence.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de ma zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'jug pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has not yet entered the womb, and because it is about to enter.

original: de dang 'brel ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni srid pa bar ma'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gzhan dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽khrag dang khu ba 'dus pa'i ming dang gzugs rnam par smin pa ni kun du brgyal ba yin te zhes bya ba na gcig la gcig rgyu mtshan gyi dngos por ming dang gzugs dang 'dres par gyur ces bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel ba'i phyir zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni srid pa bar ma'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig ma gzhan dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // khrag dang khu ba 'dus pa'i ming dang gzugs rnam par smin pa ni kun du brgyal ba yin te zhes bya ba na gcig la gcig rgyu mtshan gyi dngos por ming dang gzugs dang 'dres par gyur ces bya ba'i don te /
translated: Because it is connected with that, means because it is connected with another moment of the intermediate existence.🔽Name and form in the state of name and form, which is the result of the union of blood and semen, is called “coalesced,” which means that name and form are mixed together as the basis of each other.

original: gang las rgyu gang @121b gis ming dang gzugs su rnam par smin pa nur nur por rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: gang las rgyu gang @121b gis ming dang gzugs su rnam par smin pa nur nur por rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Name and form is posited as the state of kalala, which is the result of the cause.

original: 'on te 'di'i don ma'i mngal du mi skye ba mi 'byung ba yin na ni de'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag nyid thob pa'i tshe /
analyzed: 'on te 'di'i don ma'i mngal du mi skye ba mi 'byung ba yin na ni de'i tshe rnam par shes pa bdag nyid thob pa'i tshe /
translated: If the meaning of this passage is that it does not occur that the intermediate existence is not born in the mother’s womb, then at that time, when consciousness has obtained its own state,

original: ming dang gzugs skyes pa kho na yin pas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa de'i rkyen gyis de skye bar mi rigs te /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs skyes pa kho na yin pas de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa de'i rkyen gyis de skye bar mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical that consciousness is a condition of name and form, and that name and form are a condition of consciousness, because name and form are only born.

original: ming dang gzugs skye bar mi rigs te /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs skye bar mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical that name and form are born,

original: de nyid skyes zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid skyes zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are already born.

original: de las kyang rgyu chen po'i rnam grangs de las kyang /
analyzed: de las kyang rgyu chen po'i rnam grangs de las kyang /
translated: Also, in the great exposition on the causes of cyclic existence,🔽it is explained that until death, consciousness is a condition of name and form.

original: nam ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis dngos por bstan pas 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis de ji ltar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes par rung /
analyzed: nam ma shi'i bar du rnam par shes pa ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis dngos por bstan pas 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis de ji ltar nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes par rung /
translated: Therefore, how could it be that name and form are a condition of consciousness that links to a rebirth?

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo sde 'di las /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo sde 'di las /
translated: In this sutra on dependent origination,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis phung po lnga pa'i ming dang gzugs bstan pas nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de ji ltar de dang lhan cig 'byung ba nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba phung po lnga pa can gyi
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis phung po lnga pa'i ming dang gzugs bstan pas nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de ji ltar de dang lhan cig 'byung ba nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba phung po lnga pa can gyi
translated: The condition of consciousness is the name and form of the five aggregates.🔽The consciousness that links with the next life is the five aggregates that arise together with the consciousness that links with the next life.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rung /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rung /
translated: Since the name-and-form of the five aggregates is taught to be the condition of consciousness, how could the consciousness that links with the rebirth linking consciousness be the condition of the name-and-form of the five aggregates that arise simultaneously with it?

original: dus phyi ma'i rkyen yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dus phyi ma'i rkyen yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If you say that it is a condition of future name-and-form,🔽then what is the condition of the name-and-form of that time?

original: 'on te nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de lhan cig 'byung ba'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'on te nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de lhan cig 'byung ba'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ma yin gyi /
translated: If you think that the consciousness that links with the rebirth linking consciousness is not the condition of the name-and-form that arises simultaneously with it,

original: 'on kyang dus phyi ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on kyang dus phyi ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen yin no snyam na /
translated: but rather it is the condition of future name-and-form,

original: de'i phyir 'on de'i dus kyi ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gang yin zhes smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'on de'i dus kyi ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gang yin zhes smras te /
translated: then what is the condition of the name-and-form of that time?

original: de'i dus kyi zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dus kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i dus kyi zhes bya ba ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dus kyi'o //
translated: The time of that is the time of the consciousness that links with the rebirth linking consciousness.

original: rkyen 'du byed yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rkyen 'du byed yin no zhe na yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If you think that formative factors are the condition of consciousness,

original: 'on te 'di snyam du de yang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te 'di snyam du de yang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis yin no snyam na /
translated: then if you think that formative factors are the condition of consciousness,

original: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs de gnyi ga'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'du byed ni gnyi ga'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir de skye bar bya ba'i don du /
analyzed: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs de gnyi ga'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'du byed ni gnyi ga'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir de skye bar bya ba'i don du /
translated: then since formative factors are the condition of both the consciousness that links to rebirth and name and form, for the sake of generating consciousness,

original: ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yan lag brtag par bya /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yan lag brtag par bya /
translated: why is the link consciousness analyzed?

original: ming dang gzugs kho na'i rkyen 'du byed yin na brtag tu mi rung ste /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kho na'i rkyen 'du byed yin na brtag tu mi rung ste /
translated: If formative factors are the condition of name and form alone, it is not suitable to analyze them.🔽What is the difference between it and the subsequent moment?

original: de dang skad cig phyi mar khyad par yang ci zhig yod ces bya ba la de dang zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ming dang gzugs de dang ngo //
analyzed: de dang skad cig phyi mar khyad par yang ci zhig yod ces bya ba la de dang zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i ming dang gzugs de dang ngo //
translated: It refers to name and form that arise simultaneously with the consciousness that links to rebirth.

original: skad cig phyi ma zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: skad cig phyi ma zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma gnyis pa ste /
translated: The subsequent moment refers to the second moment.

original: gang gi rkyen du rnam par shes pa de yin par brtag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi rkyen du rnam par shes pa de yin par brtag par byed pa'o //
translated: That is the consciousness which is the condition.

original: 'on te skad cig ma las skad cig ma phyi ma nges par khyad par yod do zhes @122a * //
analyzed: 'on te skad cig ma las skad cig ma phyi ma nges par khyad par yod do zhes @122a * //
translated: But if you say that there is a definite difference between the later moment and the prior moment,

original: brjod na de lta na yan lag thams cad la yang 'di nyid thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod na de lta na yan lag thams cad la yang 'di nyid thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then the same consequence applies to all the members.

original: de bas na rdzas tha dad pa'i bye brag yod pa de glengs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na rdzas tha dad pa'i bye brag yod pa de glengs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that the difference is due to the difference in substance.

original: 'on te 'dir ji ltar srid pa rkyen gyi dngos por 'dod na ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir ji ltar srid pa rkyen gyi dngos por 'dod na ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But if you ask how the existence of name-and-form is accepted as a condition here,

original: 'on te rnam par shas pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'dir ji ltar srid pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por 'dod de /
analyzed: 'on te rnam par shas pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'dir ji ltar srid pa'i rkyen gyi dngos por 'dod de /
translated: then you should ask how the existence of name-and-form is accepted as a condition in the statement “Name-and-form has consciousness as its condition.”

original: gang na ming dang gzugs srid pa der ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen yin no //
analyzed: gang na ming dang gzugs srid pa der ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen yin no //
translated: Name-and-form is a condition for name-and-form only where name-and-form exists.

original: gang na ming 'ba' zhig srid pa gzugs med pa der ni ming nyi tshe'i rkyen yin no //
analyzed: gang na ming 'ba' zhig srid pa gzugs med pa der ni ming nyi tshe'i rkyen yin no //
translated: Name is a condition for name alone where name exists without form, in the formless realms.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs la yang ji ltar srid pa'i rkyen gyis dngos po yin pa de bzhin du ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs la yang ji ltar srid pa'i rkyen gyis dngos po yin pa de bzhin du ci'i phyir mi 'dod de /
translated: Why not accept that name-and-form is conditioned by karmic formation just as it is conditioned by the prior existence?

original: gang na ming dang gzugs srid pa der ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin no //
analyzed: gang na ming dang gzugs srid pa der ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin no //
translated: Name-and-form is conditioned by karmic formation wherever name-and-form exists.

original: gang na ming nyi tshe srid pa gzugs med pa der ni ming nyi tshe'i rkyen yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //🔽'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin na ni 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis rnam par shes pa skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na'i rkyen nyid de yin la /
analyzed: gang na ming nyi tshe srid pa gzugs med pa der ni ming nyi tshe'i rkyen yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro // 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa yin na ni 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis rnam par shes pa skyed par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa kho na'i rkyen nyid de yin la /
translated: Name-and-form is conditioned by name alone wherever name alone exists, such as in the formless realm.🔽If name-and-form were conditioned by karmic formation, it would follow that past karmic formation would generate consciousness.

original: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because karmic formation is the condition of the consciousness that links to rebirth, but it is not the condition of consciousness that occurs in a series from one moment to the next.

original: 'di ni glo bur du nyam nga bar zhugs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa gzhan yod bzhin du rgyu med par skyur ba nyid skye ba ni nyam nga par zhugs pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni glo bur du nyam nga bar zhugs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa gzhan yod bzhin du rgyu med par skyur ba nyid skye ba ni nyam nga par zhugs pa'i don yin no //
translated: The meaning of “sudden entry into a state of distress” is the abandonment of the cause of sourness without any other cause.

original: 'o na de ga las she na /
analyzed: 'o na de ga las she na /
translated: But how can this be?

original: de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni skyur ba de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ni de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni skyur ba de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ni de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ste /
translated: The text says, “due to a specific potency born from that.” A specific potency born from sourness is a specific potency born from that sourness.

original: de rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag 'di la yod bas de ni de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ste de las so //
analyzed: de rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag 'di la yod bas de ni de las skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag ste de las so //
translated: Since this is a specific transformation of the continuum, it is a specific potency born from that.

original: de dag gis ni dmar ba nyid dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de dag gis ni dmar ba nyid dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The text says, “due to a specific potency born from that.”🔽The text says, “due to a specific potency born from that,” and so on.

original: de dag gis ni phyis dmar ba dang / rtsa dmar ba nyid kyi lan kyang btab pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis ni phyis dmar ba dang / rtsa dmar ba nyid kyi lan kyang btab pa yin te /
translated: This also responds to the question, “Why is the flesh of the body red?”

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this so?

original: de nas skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag gi rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag las de'i bras bu ge sar dmar po nyid yin no//
analyzed: de nas skyes pa'i mthu'i bye brag gi rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i bye brag las de'i bras bu ge sar dmar po nyid yin no//
translated: Then, from the transformation of the continuum of the specific power of the arising of the stamen, its result is the redness of the stamen.🔽If the conditions adverse to the arising of that red stamen are removed, then the great elements that are the nature of the red stamen will arise.🔽The great elements that are the nature of the red stamen are the cause of the arising of the red stamen.🔽The great elements that are the nature of the red stamen are the cause of the arising of the red stamen.🔽The great elements that are the nature of the red stamen are the cause of the arising of the red stamen.

original: de skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen bsal na zhes bya ba ni rtsa dmar ba de skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen mi bsal na rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis lcags kyi thu lum 'byung ba chen po de 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa🔽yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsa dmar po 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen bsal na zhes bya ba ni rtsa dmar ba de skye ba dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen mi bsal na rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis lcags kyi thu lum 'byung ba chen po de 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rtsa dmar po 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: rtsa dmar po skye bar 'gyur @122b ba la bya'o // 'dir tshigs su bcad pa 'di ji ltar rgyu rnam par zhig pa las 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /

original: rgyu rnam par zhig pa las 'bras bu ma yin no //🔽gal te / rnam zhig rgyu las 'bras 'byung na //
analyzed: rgyu rnam par zhig pa las 'bras bu ma yin no // gal te / rnam zhig rgyu las 'bras 'byung na //
translated: The great elements that are the nature of the red stamen are the cause of the arising of the red stamen.

original: dbang po la sogs rnam zhig las //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs rnam zhig las //
translated: The great elements that are the nature of the red stamen are the cause of the arising of the red stamen.

original: zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
translated: This is the extensive explanation.

original: rnam par zhig pa las yin na ni dbang po dang don rnam par zhig pa las mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa ji ltar rigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par zhig pa las yin na ni dbang po dang don rnam par zhig pa las mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa'i bya ba byed pa ji ltar rigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were from the disintegration of the object, how could the activity of seeing, hearing, etc. be logically possible from the disintegration of the sense faculty and object?

original: chu skams pas gsher bar 'gyur ba dang / rlung zhi bas skams par 'gyur ba dang / brdungs pa yang rnam par zhig na sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu skams pas gsher bar 'gyur ba dang / rlung zhi bas skams par 'gyur ba dang / brdungs pa yang rnam par zhig na sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Water becomes wet when it dries up, wind becomes dry when it subsides, and sound occurs when a sound is destroyed.

original: de bzhin du me shin du ba 'byung bar 'gyur gyi zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du me shin du ba 'byung bar 'gyur gyi zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, fire becomes cold when it is extinguished, but does not become non-cold.

original: las dang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur gyi yang srid skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: las dang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gyur gyi yang srid skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
translated: Even if karma and affliction are abandoned, nirvana does not occur, but rather rebirth occurs.

original: 'o na ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it, then?

original: de las skyes pa bsgos pa gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la las de las skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de las skyes pa bsgos pa gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la las de las skyes pa yin te /
translated: Because that which arises from it is imbued and endures. That which arises from it is karma.

original: de las skyes pa de ni bsgos pa yin pas de las skyes pa bsgos pa yin te /
analyzed: de las skyes pa de ni bsgos pa yin pas de las skyes pa bsgos pa yin te /
translated: That which arises from it is imbued, therefore it is that which arises from it is imbued.

original: de gnas pa ni de las skye ba bsgos pa gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de gnas pa ni de las skye ba bsgos pa gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Its endurance is called the endurance of that which is produced from it.🔽Because it is capable of producing the effect that arises from it, and because it has not yet ceased.

original: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par nus pa ma spyad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de las byung ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par nus pa ma spyad pa nyid gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;🔽/ de lta ma yin na de 'das pa nyid yin par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gal te da ltar byung ba bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir yod do zhes smra na ni de la da ltar byung ba'i chos gzhan skye
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par nus pa ma spyad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de las byung ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par nus pa ma spyad pa nyid gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ; / de lta ma yin na de 'das pa nyid yin par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gal te da ltar byung ba bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir yod do zhes smra na ni de la da ltar byung ba'i chos gzhan skye
translated: This means that the capability of producing the effect that arises from it is apprehended as present.🔽If it were not so, it would not be established as past.

original: ba'am / 'jig pa cung zad kyang rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
analyzed: ba'am / 'jig pa cung zad kyang rnam par gzhag par mi nus te /
translated: If it were said to exist because it has its own intrinsic identity, like the present, then it would be impossible to posit it as having even the slightest arising or cessation, like the present.

original: zhib tu ni chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhib tu ni chos mngon pa'i mdzod las gzung bar bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in detail from the Abhidharmakośa.

original: 'di ltar rgyun rnam par bzhag nas 'du byed 'gags la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu 'phangs nas zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la sa bon gyi rgyun bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun rnam par
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyun rnam par bzhag nas 'du byed 'gags la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu 'phangs nas zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la sa bon gyi rgyun bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar myu gu la sogs pa'i rgyun rnam par
translated: Thus, having posited a continuum, formative factors cease and a result that is similar to it is projected from one to another.

original: bzhag nas sa bon 'gag la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu 'phangs pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi rgyan rnam par bzhag nas 'gag la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig tu 'phangs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhag nas sa bon 'gag la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu 'phangs pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi rgyan rnam par bzhag nas 'gag la de dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'bras bu gcig tu 'phangs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “like the continuum of a seed” means that just as a seed ceases having posited a continuum of a sprout and so on and a result that is similar to it is projected from one to another, in the same way, formative factors cease having posited a continuum of formative factors and a result that is similar to it is projected from one to another.

original: de'i 'og tu 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi 'og tu zhes bya @123a * //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi 'og tu zhes bya @123a * //
translated: The phrase “that which occurs later” means that which occurs later than the formative factors of merit and so on.

original: ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The phrase “that which is projected” means that which is projected from one to another.

original: ji ltar na de'i rkyen gyis lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen gyis /
analyzed: ji ltar na de'i rkyen gyis lung du ma bstan pa'i sems pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen gyis /
translated: How is it that a neutral mind continuum is a condition of that?

original: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe rnam par shes pa yin par rigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe rnam par shes pa yin par rigs par 'gyur /
translated: It is reasonable that the consciousness at the time of linking is the consciousness that appropriates.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos sa bon rul ba dang 'dra ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i myu gu skyed par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos sa bon rul ba dang 'dra ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i myu gu skyed par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: But a neutral factor, like a rotten seed, is not capable of producing the sprout that is the consciousness linking with the next existence.

original: ji ltar na yang gang de'i 'og tu lung du ma bstan pa 'byung ba'i sems pa'i rgyun 'di bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rnam par gzhag pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar na yang gang de'i 'og tu lung du ma bstan pa 'byung ba'i sems pa'i rgyun 'di bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rnam par gzhag pa yin /
translated: How then can the stream of intention that is neutral, which occurs after the action, be classified as a formative force of merit, etc.?

original: de nyid la 'du byed rnams kyi nus pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi rgyun de la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la 'du byed rnams kyi nus pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni bag chags kyi rgyun de la'o //
translated: It is precisely that stream of intention that is the formative force, not the action.

original: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dus na ni yang srid pa mngon par grub pa kho na yin pas zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyis yang srid kun du bsdus pa'i phyir ro
analyzed: nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa'i dus na ni yang srid pa mngon par grub pa kho na yin pas zhes bya ba ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de dang lhan cig 'byung ba'i chos rnams kyis yang srid kun du bsdus pa'i phyir ro
translated: At the time of the consciousness that is linking, there is the establishment of the existence that is to come, because the factors that occur together with that consciousness that is linking include the existence that is to come.

original: // de'i tshe 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang gi sa bon yin na gang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa sa bon yang srid kyi zhing las skyed do zhes brjod /
analyzed: // de'i tshe 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang gi sa bon yin na gang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa sa bon yang srid kyi zhing las skyed do zhes brjod /
translated: At that time, if the consciousness that links to rebirth has the seed of name-and-form, then why is it said that consciousness is the seed, but name-and-form is generated from the field?

original: sngon gyi srid pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyis 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu'i rgyu'i dngos po nye bar bzung nas srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis yang srid zhing la skyed do zhes bya ba ni rigs pa
analyzed: sngon gyi srid pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen can gyis 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu'i rgyu'i dngos po nye bar bzung nas srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis yang srid zhing la skyed do zhes bya ba ni rigs pa
translated: The consciousness of a previous existence, conditioned by ignorance, takes up the state of cause of the sprout of name-and-form conditioned by karmic formations, and by the continuity of the intermediate existence, it generates rebirth in a field. This is reasonable.

original: yin no // de nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa'i rkyan gyis 'du byed yin la /
analyzed: yin no // de nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa'i rkyan gyis 'du byed yin la /
translated: Therefore, it is said that karmic formations are conditioned by ignorance,

original: des bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: des bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: and the consciousness that is imbued by that is conditioned by karmic formations, and so on.

original: de ltar byas na mdo sde gzhan las rnam par shes pa sa bon zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba la de ltar byas na zhes bya ba ni ji skad du kho bos gong nyid du ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
analyzed: de ltar byas na mdo sde gzhan las rnam par shes pa sa bon zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de rigs pa yin no zhes bya ba la de ltar byas na zhes bya ba ni ji skad du kho bos gong nyid du ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
translated: If one does so means that I have already explained in detail that due to the condition of ignorance,

original: byed yin la zhes rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: byed yin la zhes rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: formations exist and so on.

original: mdo sde gzhan las rnam par shes pa sa bon yin pa ji ltar bstan zhe na /🔽kun dga' bo gal te /
analyzed: mdo sde gzhan las rnam par shes pa sa bon yin pa ji ltar bstan zhe na / kun dga' bo gal te /
translated: How is it that consciousness is taught to be a seed in other sūtras?

original: 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
translated: Ānanda, if there were no karma associated with desire,

original: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang 'dod pa'i srid pa 'grub bam /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang 'dod pa'i srid pa 'grub bam /
translated: would any desire realm existence be established anywhere?

original: btsun pa ma lags so //
analyzed: btsun pa ma lags so //
translated: No, Bhadanta.

original: kun dga' bo 'on kyang las zhing dang sred pa rlan dang / rnam par shes pa sa bon dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa can gyi sems can ma rig pas ldongs par gyur pa de dag ni 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i srid pa na sems dman pa la rnam par @123b shes pa rab tu gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: kun dga' bo 'on kyang las zhing dang sred pa rlan dang / rnam par shes pa sa bon dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa can gyi sems can ma rig pas ldongs par gyur pa de dag ni 'di lta ste 'dod pa'i srid pa na sems dman pa la rnam par @123b shes pa rab tu gnas pa yin no //
translated: Ananda, however, the field of karma, the moisture of craving, the seed of consciousness, and the sentient beings who are in the darkness of ignorance, those sentient beings who are blinded by ignorance, their consciousness is established in the lower mind, namely in the existence of the desire realm.

original: kun dga' bo gal te gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gal te gzugs dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
translated: Ananda, if there were no karma associated with form,

original: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang gzugs kyi srid pa 'grub bam /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang gzugs kyi srid pa 'grub bam /
translated: would any existence of form be established anywhere?

original: btsun pa ma lags so //🔽kun dga' bo 'on kyang las dang zhing dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: btsun pa ma lags so // kun dga' bo 'on kyang las dang zhing dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas 'di lta ste /
translated: No, Venerable One.

original: gzugs kyi srid pa nas sems pa bar ma la rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi srid pa nas sems pa bar ma la rnam par shes pa gnas pa yin no //
translated: Ananda, however, the field of karma, the moisture of craving, the seed of consciousness, and the sentient beings who are in the darkness of ignorance, those sentient beings who are blinded by ignorance, their consciousness is established in the intermediate existence, namely in the existence of form.

original: kun dga' bo gal te gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
analyzed: kun dga' bo gal te gzugs med pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i las med par gyur na /
translated: Ananda, if there were no karma associated with the formless realm,

original: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang gzugs med pa'i srid pa 'grub bam /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ga' yang gang du yang gzugs med pa'i srid pa 'grub bam /
translated: But is any form established anywhere in the formless realm?

original: btsun pa ma lags so //
analyzed: btsun pa ma lags so //
translated: No, Venerable One.

original: kun dga' bo 'on kyang las zhing dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas /
analyzed: kun dga' bo 'on kyang las zhing dang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas /
translated: Ananda, however, the field of karma is...

original: 'di lta ste gzugs med pa'i srid pa na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste gzugs med pa'i srid pa na /
translated: It is like this: in the formless realm,

original: sems pa gya nom pa la rnam par shes pa rab tu gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sems pa gya nom pa la rnam par shes pa rab tu gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: consciousness is well-established in the subtle intention.

original: 'on kyang kha cig na re de'i rgyu can rnam par ma zhig pa las yin no zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽kha cig na re rnam par ma zhig pa las yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun gyis bkur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang kha cig na re de'i rgyu can rnam par ma zhig pa las yin no zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed kyi rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // kha cig na re rnam par ma zhig pa las yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun gyis bkur pa yin no //
translated: However, some say it is from the non-disintegration of its cause, meaning it is the cause of formations such as merit.🔽Some say it is from non-disintegration, which is the opinion of the noble Saṃmitīyas.

original: kha cig na re bsags pa las yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun phal chen po'o //
analyzed: kha cig na re bsags pa las yin no zhe'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun phal chen po'o //
translated: Some say it is from accumulation, which is the opinion of the Mahāsāṃghikas.

original: sems dang mi ldan pa'i chos gzhan zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung bas ma bsdus pa'i 'dus byas ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir sems dang mi ldan pa yin par gzhag ste /
analyzed: sems dang mi ldan pa'i chos gzhan zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang sems dang sems las byung bas ma bsdus pa'i 'dus byas ni sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir sems dang mi ldan pa yin par gzhag ste /
translated: Other dharmas not associated with mind are conditioned dharmas not included in form, mind, or mental factors. They are established as not associated with mind because they are not concomitant with mind.

original: dogs pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dogs pa rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to eliminate doubt,

original: nam 'bras bu 'byin pa'i bar du rjes su 'jug pa de yin zhes bya ba ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i chos gzhan no //
analyzed: nam 'bras bu 'byin pa'i bar du rjes su 'jug pa de yin zhes bya ba ni sems dang mi ldan pa'i chos gzhan no //
translated: it is that which continues until the result is produced.🔽It is designated as that because it is produced by that.

original: des byas pa la de nye bar 'dogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyis byas pa'i rnam par ma zhig pa dang bsags pa la 'du byed nye bar 'dogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des byas pa la de nye bar 'dogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyis byas pa'i rnam par ma zhig pa dang bsags pa la 'du byed nye bar 'dogs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the unceased and accumulated action is designated as action.

original: yang na rnam par ma zhig pa dang bsags pas byas pa'i 'bras bu la 'du byed nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na rnam par ma zhig pa dang bsags pas byas pa'i 'bras bu la 'du byed nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: Or, the result produced by the unceased and accumulated action is designated as action.

original: 'du byed rnams nye bar btags pa ni 'du byed nye bar btags pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams nye bar btags pa ni 'du byed nye bar btags pa ste /
translated: The designation of action is the designation of action.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes rkyen nyid nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes rkyen nyid nye bar 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the consciousness that links with the next existence is figuratively designated as a condition, due to the condition of the formative forces.

original: dper na rkun pos grong khyer bsregs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rkun pos bsgrubs pa'i me la rkun po bzhin @124a * //🔽du nye bar 'dogs pa'am /
analyzed: dper na rkun pos grong khyer bsregs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rkun pos bsgrubs pa'i me la rkun po bzhin @124a * // du nye bar 'dogs pa'am /
translated: For example, “the thieves burned the town” means that the fire established by the thieves is figuratively designated as a thief,

original: rkun pos bsgrubs pa'i mes bsregs pa la rkun pos grong khyer bsregs so zhes rkun por nye bar 'dogs so //🔽rtsvas 'bras chan tshos pa dang zhes bya ba ni rtsa las byung ba'i ma la rtsa nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'am /
analyzed: rkun pos bsgrubs pa'i mes bsregs pa la rkun pos grong khyer bsregs so zhes rkun por nye bar 'dogs so // rtsvas 'bras chan tshos pa dang zhes bya ba ni rtsa las byung ba'i ma la rtsa nye bar 'dogs par byed pa'am /
translated: or that the burning of the town by the fire established by the thieves is figuratively designated as a thief.🔽“The rice was cooked by the grass” means that the rice established by the grass is figuratively designated as grass,

original: rtsa las byung ba'i mes byas pa la rtsvas 'bras chan tshos so zhes rtsva rnams kyis byas pa nying du nye bar 'dogs so //
analyzed: rtsa las byung ba'i mes byas pa la rtsvas 'bras chan tshos so zhes rtsva rnams kyis byas pa nying du nye bar 'dogs so //
translated: or that the cooking of the rice by the fire established by the grass is figuratively designated as the grass.

original: 'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde //
translated: The noble ones are happy to see.

original: zhes bya pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya pa ni /
translated: This means that

original: 'phags pa mthong ba kho na bde ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa mthong ba kho na bde ba ma yin gyi /
translated: it is not only the noble ones who are happy to see,🔽but also the ordinary worldlings.

analyzed: bde ba'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir bde ba zhes nye bar 'dogs pa lta bu'o //

analyzed: de dag gi yang mdo sde dang 'gal ba de kho na bzhin du gnas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yin zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par dbye ba las rnam par shes pa gang zhe na /

translated: But since the intermediate existence is connected to the mind consciousness, how can the six collections of consciousness be the condition for consciousness?🔽Obtainment and so on are not conditions for the arising of consciousness.
