translated: It should not be said that it is like that.

original: ris mthun pa'am srog gi dbang po'i rdzas gzhan ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin na gang la de dag lus kyi dngos po'i rdzas rnam par gzhag par bya /
analyzed: ris mthun pa'am srog gi dbang po'i rdzas gzhan ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin na gang la de dag lus kyi dngos po'i rdzas rnam par gzhag par bya /
translated: Since there is not the slightest substance of the homogeneous collection or the life faculty, on what basis would they posit the substance of the body?

original: mes bsregs pa'i dngos po'i phyogs bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i phra rgyas rang 'gag pa na 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mes bsregs pa'i dngos po'i phyogs bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo pa'i phra rgyas rang 'gag pa na 'grub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Also, when the negative tendencies of the summit of existence cease, they are not established like the burned substance of a thing.

original: srid pa'i rtse mor skye ba'i rgyu nyid stobs can ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mor skye ba'i rgyu nyid stobs can ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not established that the cause of birth in the summit of existence is not powerful.

original: srid par skye ba'i mthu 'joms par byed pa yin na yang 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus ci zhig byar yod de /
analyzed: srid par skye ba'i mthu 'joms par byed pa yin na yang 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus ci zhig byar yod de /
translated: If it destroys the power of birth in existence, what would be the power of the ārya path?

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam bas kyang mi dgos pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam bas kyang mi dgos pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Because it would follow that it is not necessary even by the mundane path.

original: // / @130b rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa rgya cher 'grel pa /🔽bam po drug pa /
analyzed: // / @130b rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa rgya cher 'grel pa /🔽bam po drug pa /
translated: The Commentary on the Transmission of the Doctrine

original: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis spangs pa'i phra rgyas de dag nyid sa der skye ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis spangs pa'i phra rgyas de dag nyid sa der skye ba'i rgyu yang ma yin no //
translated: And those proclivities that are abandoned by the mundane path are not even the cause of birth in that stage.

original: nyams smad pa tsam gyis spangs pa dag 'phags pa'i lam gyis yin par rigs pa yang ma yin te gcig kho nar nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams smad pa tsam gyis spangs pa dag 'phags pa'i lam gyis yin par rigs pa yang ma yin te gcig kho nar nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not reasonable that they are abandoned by the noble path through mere weakening, because the afflictions arise in only one way, and the noble path is incompatible with that.

original: nyon mongs pa'i dngos po'i phyogs kyi dpe yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dngos po'i phyogs kyi dpe yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is also unreasonable to give the example of the side of the entity of the afflictions.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin no zhe na yang phyogs te sngar dpyad zin to zhes bya ba ni ji ltar byas she na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yin no zhe na yang phyogs te sngar dpyad zin to zhes bya ba ni ji ltar byas she na /
translated: If you say it is mental consciousness, that is not so, because it was previously analyzed. How was it analyzed?

original: de'i tshe rnam par shes pa 'dod pa gang zhig yin kha cig na re yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o zhe'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par shes pa 'dod pa gang zhig yin kha cig na re yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o zhe'o //
translated: At that time, what is the consciousness that desires? Some say it is mental consciousness.

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa ci yin zhe na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba thams cad rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa ci yin zhe na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba thams cad rig par bya'o //
translated: What is its object and aspect? All of that should be understood in detail.

original: gal te 'gags na gang las yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'gags na gang las yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it ceases, from what would it arise again?🔽That position has already been analyzed.

original: phyogs de yang sngar dpyad zin to zhes bya ba ji ltar byas she na /
analyzed: phyogs de yang sngar dpyad zin to zhes bya ba ji ltar byas she na /
translated: How has it been analyzed?

original: gzhan dag na re 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba dang / sems kyi rgyun chad pa dag kyang 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems ji ltar 'byung zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sems med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba dang / sems kyi rgyun chad pa dag kyang 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i sems ji ltar 'byung zhes smras pa ma yin nam zhes bya ba dang /
translated: Others say that the meditative attainment of cessation is the absence of mind, and that the mind arises from the mind that is infused by the formative forces, even though the continuum of the mind is severed.

original: lus kyang dbang po la /
analyzed: lus kyang dbang po la /
translated: The body is the basis of the faculties.🔽The seeds are located in the body.

original: sa bon gnas pa yin no zhes rgyas par 'byung ba thams cad yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sa bon gnas pa yin no zhes rgyas par 'byung ba thams cad yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is how it should be understood.🔽Thus, it is also logical.

original: de ltar rigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rigs pas kyang ji ltar bstan zin pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa gzhag par mi nus so zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni rigs pas kyang ji ltar bstan zin pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa gzhag par mi nus so zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The following is also logical: If the foundation consciousness did not exist, the statement that consciousness is conditioned by the formative forces would not be tenable.

original: mdo sde ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa rnams lus kyi 'du byed ma 'gags pa yin no zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: mdo sde ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa rnams lus kyi 'du byed ma 'gags pa yin no zhes rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
translated: “The body’s formative forces are not terminated for those who have entered the meditative absorption of cessation.”🔽The treatise states:

original: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba ni btsun pas ston pa'i chos mngon pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las de nyid brjod do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bstan bcos las kyang zhes bya ba ni btsun pas ston pa'i chos mngon pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las de nyid brjod do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “The Venerable One has stated this in the Abhidharma, a doctrinal formulation of the Buddha’s teachings.”

original: de ltar na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin par grub pa yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin par grub pa yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, it is established that the foundation consciousness exists.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa gang gi bar du rnam par gzhag ce na /🔽srid pa'i gnas skabs la thug gi bar du'o zhes bya ba la srid pa'i gnas skabs ni srid pa'i rkyen can gyi len pa'i mthus 'du byed kyis bsgos pa'i 'jug pa snyed pa yang srid mngon par 'grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes rnam
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa gang gi bar du rnam par gzhag ce na / srid pa'i gnas skabs la thug gi bar du'o zhes bya ba la srid pa'i gnas skabs ni srid pa'i rkyen can gyi len pa'i mthus 'du byed kyis bsgos pa'i 'jug pa snyed pa yang srid mngon par 'grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes rnam
translated: Up to what point is consciousness posited as having formative predispositions as its causal condition?

original: @131a * // par gzhag gi rnam par shes par ma yin no //
analyzed: @131a * // par gzhag gi rnam par shes par ma yin no //
translated: Up to the point of the life-cycle’s existence. The life-cycle’s existence refers to the consciousness that actualizes the next existence, which is infused by the formative forces through the power of grasping, which has the life-cycle as its causal condition. This is posited as the life-cycle, but not as consciousness.

original: 'o na rgyu chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs las zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni de las 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ni srid pa phan chad nam ma shi'i bar du ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen nyid du bstan na ji ltar de srid pa
analyzed: 'o na rgyu chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs las zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni de las 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ni srid pa phan chad nam ma shi'i bar du ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen nyid du bstan na ji ltar de srid pa
translated: Conditioned by karmic formation, consciousness is taught to be the condition of name and form from the time of the next existence until death.

original: la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag gi nam ma shi'i bar du ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag gi nam ma shi'i bar du ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it posited until the time of existence and not until death?

original: de'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs skyes pa na zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs skyes pa na zhes rgyas par 'byung ba yin te /
translated: When the result of name and form arises,

original: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs skyes pa na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i ming dang gzugs ni de las gzhan pa'i ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs skyes pa na rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de dang / de las gzhan pa'i ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu'i ming dang gzugs ni de las gzhan pa'i ming dang gzugs so //
translated: The name-and-form other than that is the name-and-form other than the result of consciousness conditioned by karmic formations.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: skye mched drug nas brtsams te rgyun gyis 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: skye mched drug nas brtsams te rgyun gyis 'jug pa ste /
translated: It is the six sense bases, etc., that occur in a continuum.

original: de ma shi'i bar du gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ma shi'i bar du gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because until death, the continuum of name-and-form occurs in dependence on the body.

original: gcig la gcig brten pa ni gcig la gcig brten pa'o //
analyzed: gcig la gcig brten pa ni gcig la gcig brten pa'o //
translated: Mutual dependence is dependence on each other.

original: gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa ni /
translated: The continuum of mutual dependence is the continuum of mutual dependence.

original: gnyis yin pas /
analyzed: gnyis yin pas /
translated: Since there are two,

original: de gnyis ni gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyis ni gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: those two are the continuum of mutual dependence.

original: de'i dngos po gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa nyid do //
translated: The continuum of the thing that is the basis of the other is the subsequent condition.

original: phyir ni gzugs nas gcig la gcig rkyen du bstan te /
analyzed: phyir ni gzugs nas gcig la gcig rkyen du bstan te /
translated: The form base is the condition of the other bases.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi yin no //🔽de yang de'i yin no //🔽mdo sde 'di las kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs ma byung ba 'byung ba'i
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni ming dang gzugs kyi yin no // de yang de'i yin no // mdo sde 'di las kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa ni tshe rabs gzhan du de'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa'i 'bras bu ming dang gzugs ma byung ba 'byung ba'i
translated: The form base is the name-and-form of the ripening consciousness.🔽Name-and-form is the condition of the six sense bases.🔽The Sūtra on Dependent Origination says:🔽Conditioned by formations is consciousness. In the future, its result is said to be the other lifetimes.

original: rkyen du dgongs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rkyen du dgongs pa yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of this is that the future result of consciousness, which is name-and-form, is the condition of the future result of consciousness.

original: skyes pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa'i rgyun rjes su 'jug pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the condition of the subsequent continuation of the stream of consciousness that has already arisen.

original: de ji tsam 'brel ba'i bar du de rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba ming dang gzugs dang 'brel ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: de ji tsam 'brel ba'i bar du de rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba ming dang gzugs dang 'brel ba'i bar du zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: It is posited as long as it is related to name-and-form.

original: de dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo gnas skabs 'di la rnam par gzhag go //🔽ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du yin gyi de phan chad ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo gnas skabs 'di la rnam par gzhag go // ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du yin gyi de phan chad ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzhag go zhes bya ba'i skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The nature of the other factors is established in this stage.🔽Name-and-form exists until the six sense bases are formed.

original: 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa @131b pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa @131b pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du yin gyi /
translated: Name-and-form is conditioned by the karmic forces, and it exists until the six sense bases are formed.

original: phan chad rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phan chad rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not established beyond that.

original: gzhan ni nam ma shi'i bar du rnam par mi dgag go //🔽ming dang gzugs de skyes nas kyang de la yod pa'i zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: gzhan ni nam ma shi'i bar du rnam par mi dgag go // ming dang gzugs de skyes nas kyang de la yod pa'i zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The other factors are not established until death.🔽Name-and-form that has arisen exists in that.

original: de la yod pa ni ming dang gzugs la yod pa ste /
analyzed: de la yod pa ni ming dang gzugs la yod pa ste /
translated: Name-and-form exists in that consciousness that is conditioned by the karmic forces.

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The consciousness that is the result of karmic maturation is the store consciousness.

original: tshe snga ma'i las kyis 'phangs pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba 'dis ni gal te na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ma yin pa yang yod pas /
analyzed: tshe snga ma'i las kyis 'phangs pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba 'dis ni gal te na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ma yin pa yang yod pas /
translated: This passage indicates that consciousness is not conditioned by karmic formation.🔽

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag yin par srid pa la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag gi de nas ni ma yin par ston to /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag yin par srid pa la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag gi de nas ni ma yin par ston to /
translated: This passage indicates that since there is consciousness that is not conditioned by formations, the link of consciousness has formations as a condition up until the link of existence, but not beyond that.🔽The phrase “that which is produced by that” refers to name-and-form, which is capable of arising because it is produced by the formations.

original: des byas pa de skye bar nus pa zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyis byas pa ming dang gzugs skye bar nus pa ma spyad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzung nas dang / sems la bzhag nas bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: des byas pa de skye bar nus pa zhes bya ba ni 'du byed kyis byas pa ming dang gzugs skye bar nus pa ma spyad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzung nas dang / sems la bzhag nas bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “that which is grasped and placed in the mind” means the object that is to be acted upon.

original: ming dang gzugs gang la de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs gang la de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase “because it is imbued with the impregnations of the formations that project it” means that it is imbued with the impregnations of the formations that project that name-and-form.

original: de'i don du ming dang gzugs kyi ched du 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag gi / gang du nus pa dpyad zin na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs gang la nus pa spyad zin pa de🔽'du byed kyi rkyen gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin zhing de las brtsams te /
analyzed: de'i don du ming dang gzugs kyi ched du 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag gi / gang du nus pa dpyad zin na ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ming dang gzugs gang la nus pa spyad zin pa de 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yin zhing de las brtsams te /
translated: For that purpose, the link of consciousness is presented as the condition for name and form, but not in terms of the potential that has already been used.

original: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag pa ma yin no //
translated: Name and form is the foundation consciousness that is conditioned by karmic formation, and the link of consciousness is not presented as the condition for karmic formation that begins with the foundation consciousness.

original: de ltar na de'i rjes la sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no zhes smras te /
analyzed: de ltar na de'i rjes la sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no zhes smras te /
translated: Thus, the inconceivable ripening of the karma of sentient beings is stated.

original: las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni las kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
analyzed: las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni las kyi rnam par smin pa ste /
translated: The ripening of karma is the ripening of karma.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la 'du byed kyis shin tu rnam pa mang por bsgos pa rnams nye bar spyad pa dang / nye bar ma spyad pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la 'du byed kyis shin tu rnam pa mang por bsgos pa rnams nye bar spyad pa dang / nye bar ma spyad pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the formations that are infused in the store consciousness in many ways are inconceivable in terms of their use and nonuse.

original: 'du byed rnams ni skye ba'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni skye ba'i dbang du byas te /
translated: The formations are in relation to birth.

original: rab tu 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rab tu 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Because they are completely destroyed,

original: lha la sogs par skye ba'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: lha la sogs par skye ba'i dbang du byas te /
translated: in relation to birth as a god, etc.

original: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams 'dug @132a * //
analyzed: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed rnams 'dug @132a * //
translated: The formations of merit, etc.

original: pa yin gyi srid pa bar ma'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: pa yin gyi srid pa bar ma'i ni ma yin no //
translated: are present, but not the intermediate existence.🔽Because no one creates the formations of merit, etc.

original: 'ga' yang srid pa bar ma tsam gyi ched du bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' yang srid pa bar ma tsam gyi ched du bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: for the sake of just the intermediate existence.

original: de med par yang der skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par yang der skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because there is no birth there in the absence of that intermediate existence.

original: de bas na srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rnam par shes pa mi gzhag go //
analyzed: de bas na srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rnam par shes pa mi gzhag go //
translated: Therefore, consciousness is not posited as the condition of name-and-form in the intermediate existence.

original: der yang rnam par smin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs par skye ba de rnam par smin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: der yang rnam par smin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs par skye ba de rnam par smin pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, because the karmic maturation is not complete.

original: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed gang gis rnam par shes pa de la bsgos pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa'i rnam par smin pa de yang yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: bsod nams la sogs pa'i 'du byed gang gis rnam par shes pa de la bsgos pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa'i rnam par smin pa de yang yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ram /
translated: The birth of gods and so on is not karmic maturation because the karmic maturation of any karmic maturation of any karmic action such as merit that is infused in consciousness is not complete.

original: 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam par smin pa ni der yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam par smin pa ni der yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Or because the karmic maturation of consciousness infused by karmic action is not complete there.

original: srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs la ni rnam par smin pa de thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin te /
analyzed: srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs la ni rnam par smin pa de thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin te /
translated: Because all karmic maturation of name and form in the intermediate existence is not complete.

original: skye bas bsdus pa de ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye bas bsdus pa de ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is subsumed by birth has not yet arisen.

original: las kyi bye brag gis ni nus pa'i bye brag skye pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa'i bye brag skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: las kyi bye brag gis ni nus pa'i bye brag skye pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i nus pa'i bye brag skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because the specific potency arises from the specific karma. This means that the specific potency of consciousness arises.

original: yang srid mngon par 'grub par bya ba la nus pa skyes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: yang srid mngon par 'grub par bya ba la nus pa skyes pa ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin par bstan to //
translated: The arising of the potency to actualize a new existence is taught as consciousness conditioned by karmic formations.

original: rnam bar shes pa'i nus pa'i bye brag de yang las kyi bye brag gis 'gyur bas rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la 'du byed rnams gtso bo nyid du grags pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam bar shes pa'i nus pa'i bye brag de yang las kyi bye brag gis 'gyur bas rnam par shes pa bskyed pa la 'du byed rnams gtso bo nyid du grags pa yin no //
translated: And since that specific potency of consciousness is due to the specific karma, karmic formations are renowned as primary in producing consciousness.

original: 'dir las kyi bye brag smos pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi las bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir las kyi bye brag smos pa ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi las bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the specific karma is mentioned in order to teach the karma that has the characteristic of karmic formation.

original: nus pa'i bye brag smos pa 'di yang srid kyi ming dang gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa'i bye brag smos pa 'di yang srid kyi ming dang gzugs skyed pa'i nus pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And this mention of the specific potency is in order to teach the potency that produces name-and-form in the new existence.

original: de dag gis ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi las ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i rten gyi rgyun 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i nus pa bsal to //
analyzed: de dag gis ni 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyi las ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i rten gyi rgyun 'jug pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i nus pa bsal to //
translated: The function of the formative forces, which is their characteristic, is to cause the continuity of the support of mind and the mental concomitants and to eliminate the potency of consciousness.

original: yang na nyon mongs pas byas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bye brag gis yang srid mngon par 'grub par nus pa yin la /
analyzed: yang na nyon mongs pas byas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i bye brag gis yang srid mngon par 'grub par nus pa yin la /
translated: Alternatively, the particularities of consciousness that are produced by the mental afflictions are capable of actualizing a new existence.

original: las kyi bye brag gis nus pa'i bye brag yin te /
analyzed: las kyi bye brag gis nus pa'i bye brag yin te /
translated: The particularities of that potency are due to the particularities of karma.

original: ris mthun pa khyad par can gyi ming dang gzugs kyi rgyur gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: ris mthun pa khyad par can gyi ming dang gzugs kyi rgyur gyur pa yin no //
translated: It is the cause of name-and-form that is distinguished by a particular type of homogeneous existence.

original: ji skad du gal te de bsod nams kyi 'du byed mngon par 'du byed na rnam par shes pa'i bsod nams su nye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du gal te de bsod nams kyi 'du byed mngon par 'du byed na rnam par shes pa'i bsod nams su nye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As it is said: “If one engages in meritorious formative forces, consciousness will be directed towards merit.

original: mi g-yo ba'i bar du @132b nye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //🔽rnam par shes pa'i don bsdus pa rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam pa bco brgyad 'dir bstan te /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i bar du @132b nye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so // rnam par shes pa'i don bsdus pa rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam pa bco brgyad 'dir bstan te /
translated: It will be directed towards the immovable.🔽The meaning of consciousness is summarized in these eighteen topics.

original: rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The classification of consciousness is presented in terms of the following:

original: de la dbang po tha dad pa'i sgo nas rnam par shes pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan to zhes bya ba rgyas par bstan to //
analyzed: de la dbang po tha dad pa'i sgo nas rnam par shes pa'i rab tu dbye ba bstan to zhes bya ba rgyas par bstan to //
translated: The classification of consciousnesses by way of different faculties is taught in detail, beginning with the words, “The classification of consciousnesses is taught in detail.

original: 'jug ba'i dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: 'jug ba'i dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: The establishment of the classification of engagement is

original: ji skad du tshogs kyi sgras ni dmigs pa la 'jug pa'i dbye ba yang bstan to zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad du tshogs kyi sgras ni dmigs pa la 'jug pa'i dbye ba yang bstan to zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: as it is taught in the words, “The term ‘aggregate’ also teaches the classification of engagement with objects.”

original: rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du mig la brten nas gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa'o //🔽gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du gal te rnam par shes pas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du mig la brten nas gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa'o // gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du gal te rnam par shes pas /
translated: The establishment of their individual natures is as it is taught in the words, “Consciousness of visual forms, etc., based on the eye,” and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa so sor rnam par rig pa yin na ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa so sor rnam par rig pa yin na ci'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: The establishment of their designations is as it is taught in the words, “If consciousness is the individual perception of visual forms, etc., why is it called eye consciousness?” and so on.

original: rgyu rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: The establishment of their causes is

original: ji skad du mdo sde gzhan las /
analyzed: ji skad du mdo sde gzhan las /
translated: as it is taught in other sūtras:

original: gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung //
analyzed: gnyis la brten nas rnam par shes pa 'byung //
translated: Consciousness arises in dependence on two.

original: sa bon gyi rten rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: sa bon gyi rten rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the basis of seeds is as follows:

original: chos thams cad kyi sa bon gyi gnas gang yin pa'o zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi sa bon gyi gnas gang yin pa'o zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: It is the basis of all phenomena’s seeds.

original: nye bar 'dzin pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: nye bar 'dzin pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the appropriator is as follows:

original: len pa ni rnam par shes pa yang de yin te zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: len pa ni rnam par shes pa yang de yin te zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o //
translated: It is consciousness that appropriates.

original: lus kyi gzhi rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: lus kyi gzhi rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the basis of the body is as follows:

original: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa yang /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa yang /
translated: It is the ripening consciousness.

original: de yin zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas lus kyi dngos po de dang de'i rten nyid du rnam par smin pa zhes bstan pa'o //🔽dmigs pa dang rnam pa rnam @133a * //
analyzed: de yin zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas lus kyi dngos po de dang de'i rten nyid du rnam par smin pa zhes bstan pa'o // dmigs pa dang rnam pa rnam @133a * //
translated: It is the ripening of that which is the basis of the body.

original: par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the object and aspect is as follows:

original: 'o na dmigs pa dang rnam pa ci yin /
analyzed: 'o na dmigs pa dang rnam pa ci yin /
translated: What is its object and aspect?

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'o zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'o zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: It is the object and aspect that are not determined.

original: bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa ji skad du /
analyzed: bsdu ba rnam par gzhag pa ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the inclusion is as follows:

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po gang gi nang du 'dus /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po gang gi nang du 'dus /
translated: In which of the appropriated aggregates is it included?

original: rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung por zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa'i phung por zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: The aggregates that appropriate consciousness are taught.

original: rigs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o //🔽lung rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: rigs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa med na zhes rgyas par bstan pa'o // lung rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of reasoning is taught in detail, beginning with “If there were no foundation consciousness. . . .”

original: mdo sde dang bstan bcos dang zhes bstan pa'o //🔽khyab pa rnam par gzhag ba ni ji skad du /🔽srid pa'i gnas skabs la thug gi bar du zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: mdo sde dang bstan bcos dang zhes bstan pa'o // khyab pa rnam par gzhag ba ni ji skad du / srid pa'i gnas skabs la thug gi bar du zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: The presentation of scripture is taught in the passage beginning with “The sūtras and the śāstras. . . .”

original: nges pa rnam par gzhag pa ji skad du /
analyzed: nges pa rnam par gzhag pa ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of pervasion is taught in the passage beginning with “Until the end of cyclic existence. . . .”

original: ming dang gzugs gang du de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nus pa ma spyad pa yin la /🔽de'i ched du 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag gi gang du nus pa spyad pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs gang du de 'phen par byed pa'i 'du byed kyis bsgos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir nus pa ma spyad pa yin la / de'i ched du 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'i yan lag rnam par gzhag gi gang du nus pa spyad pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: The presentation of certainty is taught in the passage beginning with “Name and form are empowered by the formative forces that impel them. . . .”

original: 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The presentation of the result is taught in the passage beginning with “The link of consciousness is presented as the condition for name and form. . . .”

original: ci'i phyir srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rnam par shes pa mi gzhag /'du byed rnams ni skye ba'i ched du byas te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir srid pa bar ma'i ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du rnam par shes pa mi gzhag /'du byed rnams ni skye ba'i ched du byas te /
translated: Why is consciousness not posited as the condition of name-and-form in the intermediate existence?

original: 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir zhes rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir zhes rgyas par bstan pa yin no //
translated: Because formations are produced for the sake of birth and they are engaged in that.

original: rkyen gtso bor rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
analyzed: rkyen gtso bor rnam par gzhag pa ni ji skad du /
translated: The principal condition is posited as stated in the Abhidharma:

original: las kyi bye brag gis de'i nus pa'i bye brag skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi bye brag gis de'i nus pa'i bye brag skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'o //
translated: because the specific power of karma produces it.

original: rnam par shes pa rab tu dbye ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rab tu dbye ba rdzogs so /
translated: The analysis of consciousness is complete.

original: // / ming gang zhe na zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: // / ming gang zhe na zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni /
translated: What is name?

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes gsungs pa la /
translated: Name is the four aggregates that are associated with consciousness as a condition for name-and-form.

original: ming 'di ni 'jig rten dang / gsung rab las sgra dang / tshig bla dags yin no zhes grags so //
analyzed: ming 'di ni 'jig rten dang / gsung rab las sgra dang / tshig bla dags yin no zhes grags so //
translated: Name is known as sound and words in the world and in the scriptures.

original: gsung rab las gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yin par yang grags so //
analyzed: gsung rab las gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi yin par yang grags so //
translated: It is also known in the scriptures as the four immaterial aggregates.

original: tshig bla dags tsam bsal ba'i phyir gsung rab nyid las gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tshig bla dags tsam bsal ba'i phyir gsung rab nyid las gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to eliminate the mere designation, the scripture itself says, “The four aggregates that are not form.”

original: tshig bla dags ni mdo sde'i lugs kyi dag gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs su 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: tshig bla dags ni mdo sde'i lugs kyi dag gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs su 'dus pa'o //
translated: Since the designation is the nature of the collection of words in the sutra system, it is included in form.

original: rnam par smra ba'i lugs kyi mi ldan pa'i 'du byed du bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ming du 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smra ba'i lugs kyi mi ldan pa'i 'du byed du bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir ming du 'dus pa yin no //
translated: Since it is included in the nonassociated formative forces in the Vaibhasika system, it is included in name.

original: mdo sde 'di las ni kun bsdus te /
analyzed: mdo sde 'di las ni kun bsdus te /
translated: In this sutra, it is included in both.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming yin par dgongs kyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming yin par dgongs kyi /
translated: The intention is that name is the condition of consciousness,

original: tshig bla dags tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig bla dags tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the mere designation.

original: gzugs gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs gang zhe na /
translated: What is form?

original: gang cung zad gzugs @133b gang yin pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba des ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa ma gtogs pa'i gzugs yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gang cung zad gzugs @133b gang yin pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba des ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa ma gtogs pa'i gzugs yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: The answer, “Whatever is form is included in the aggregates of form,” indicates that apart from the primary elements and the form derived from the primary elements, there is no other form.

original: de ltar re zhig rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis gzugs ni 'di lta ste 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba las yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis gzugs ni 'di lta ste 'byung ba rnams dang 'byung ba las yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, the condition of consciousness is form, namely, the primary elements and that which is derived from the primary elements.

original: 'dir ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pas bsdus pa'i gzugs 'di thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis yin par nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pas bsdus pa'i gzugs 'di thams cad rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis yin par nges par gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not certain that all form included in the primary elements and that derived from the primary elements is the condition of consciousness.

original: skye mched drug ma dod kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag kyang /
analyzed: skye mched drug ma dod kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la thug gi bar du rnam par gzhag kyang /
translated: Up to the arising of the six sense spheres is stated because the condition of consciousness is form up to the arising of the six sense spheres.

original: skye mched drug man chad du ming dang gzugs dgag pa ni ma yin no //🔽de nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste zhes smras te /
analyzed: skye mched drug man chad du ming dang gzugs dgag pa ni ma yin no // de nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ste zhes smras te /
translated: However, form is not refuted after the arising of the six sense spheres.🔽Therefore, it is said that the condition of consciousness is form.

original: 'di ltar des bsgos pa'i zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: 'di ltar des bsgos pa'i zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Thus, it is said that form is infused by consciousness.

original: 'di ltar gang gi phyir des bsgos pa'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la 'du byed kyis gzhag pa'i bsgos pa'i bye brag gis /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang gi phyir des bsgos pa'i bye brag gis zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa la 'du byed kyis gzhag pa'i bsgos pa'i bye brag gis /
translated: Thus, due to the specific transformation of consciousness,

original: ris mthun pa gzhan du ming dang gzugs de bye brag thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ris mthun pa gzhan du ming dang gzugs de bye brag thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: name-and-form is established in another life in all its variety.

original: 'jig rten sna tshogs las las skyes //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten sna tshogs las las skyes // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The world is diverse due to the diversity of karma.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba'i rgyu ni las yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis skye ba'i rgyu ni las yin no //
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavån has said, “Karma is the cause of birth.

original: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ni sred pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ni sred pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: Craving is the cause of origination.”🔽The experience of the three kinds of pleasure, etc. is feeling.

original: de la bde ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum myong ba ni tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong ba ni myong bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de la bde ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum myong ba ni tshor ba'o zhes bya ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa myong ba ni myong bar gyur pa ste /
translated: The experience of pleasure, pain, and neither pleasure nor pain is feeling.

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba skyes pa ni nyams bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang gnyi ga las rnam par grol ba'i yul yid kyis nyams su myong ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba skyes pa ni nyams bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang gnyi ga las rnam par grol ba'i yul yid kyis nyams su myong ba'o //
translated: The experience of pleasure, pain, or neither pleasure nor pain is the experience of the object by the mental faculty, which is liberated from both pleasure and pain.

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa ni 'du shes te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa ni 'du shes te /
translated: The sign of the object of perception is perception.

original: dmigs pa'i bye brag 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i bye brag 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the term is the grasping of the particular of the object.

original: dmigs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sngon po dang ser po dang ring po dang thung du dang bud med dang skyes pa dang mdza' bo dang dgra dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag 'dzin pa 'di ni 'du shes so //
analyzed: dmigs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i sngon po dang ser po dang ring po dang thung du dang bud med dang skyes pa dang mdza' bo dang dgra dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bye brag 'dzin pa 'di ni 'du shes so //
translated: The grasping of the particular of the object, such as form, etc., blue, yellow, long, short, female, male, friend, enemy, pleasure, pain, is perception.

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed do zhes bya ba ni tshor ba dang 'du shes de gnyis las gzhan pa de @134a * //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams dang / sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed do zhes bya ba ni tshor ba dang 'du shes de gnyis las gzhan pa de @134a * //
translated: Other mental factors and formations not associated with the mind.

original: dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the other mental factors and formations not associated with the mind?

original: 'dun pa dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang blo dang dran pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa dang reg pa dang yid la byed pa dang blo dang dran pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are aspiration, contact, mental attention, understanding, memory, etc.

original: sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa ni thob pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa ni thob pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those not associated with the mind are acquisition, etc.

original: yul nye bar dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yul nye bar dmigs pa ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The object is apprehended by consciousness.

original: bye brag bor nas dngos po tsam la lta ba'o//🔽'o na ni mig gi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po shes kyi sngon po'o snyam du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag bor nas dngos po tsam la lta ba'o// 'o na ni mig gi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po shes kyi sngon po'o snyam du ni ma yin no //
translated: The object is seen as a mere thing, disregarding its distinctions.🔽If that is so, then it contradicts the statement: The eye consciousness knows blue, but does not know blue is blue.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po shes shing sngon po'o snyam du yang yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'di 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas ni sngon po shes shing sngon po'o snyam du yang yin no zhes 'byung ba dang 'di 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: The mental consciousness knows blue and knows blue is blue.

original: rnam par shes pas sngon po snyam du rnam par shes kyi zhes bya ba ni mtshungs par ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pas sngon po snyam du rnam par shes kyi zhes bya ba ni mtshungs par ldan pa yin te /
translated: Consciousness is the cognition of blue, etc.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams gnas dang / dmigs pa dang rnam par mtshungs pa'i phyir te 'gal ba med do //🔽mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'du shes ni zhen pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pas na /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams gnas dang / dmigs pa dang rnam par mtshungs pa'i phyir te 'gal ba med do // mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshogs dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'du shes ni zhen pa yin pa'i phyir dang / mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su byed pas na /
translated: The mind and mental factors are associated because they are the same in three ways: they have the same support, the same object, and the same time.

original: bye brag yongs su gcod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag yongs su gcod pa ma yin no //
translated: The discrimination that is associated with the group of consciousnesses such as visual consciousness is not a determination of a specific thing because it is adherence and it is not a determination of a specific thing because it is not a determination of a specific thing.

original: de la kha cig na re cung zad shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: de la kha cig na re cung zad shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: Some say: Consciousness is the cognition of a small part,

original: cung zad zos pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /🔽ji ltar cung zad zos pa la chung du zos /
analyzed: cung zad zos pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni / ji ltar cung zad zos pa la chung du zos /
translated: like the cognition of a small part that has been eaten.

original: cung zad zos zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: cung zad zos zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: Just as one says, “I have eaten a little,” or “I have eaten a small part,”🔽so too, consciousness is the cognition of a small part.

original: mi bzad pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: mi bzad pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: Consciousness is the cognition of an unbearable object.

original: gzugs ngan pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mi sdug pa'i gzugs la gzugs ngan pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs ngan pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mi sdug pa'i gzugs la gzugs ngan pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like an ugly form.

original: shes pa'i las nus pa med pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i las nus pa med pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: A consciousness that is not capable of activity is consciousness.

original: sems g-yengs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sems kyi las mi nus pa'i sems la sems g-yengs pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sems g-yengs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar sems kyi las mi nus pa'i sems la sems g-yengs pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like a distracted mind.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs pa'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: A consciousness that is not complete is consciousness.

original: yan lag ma tshang ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yan lag ma rdzogs pa la yan lag ma tshang ba zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag ma tshang ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yan lag ma rdzogs pa la yan lag ma tshang ba zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like a crippled limb.

original: mi gsal ba'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i shes pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: A consciousness that is not clear is consciousness.

original: kha zas ma zhu ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsal bar zhu bar ma gyur pa'i zas la zas ma zhu ba zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: kha zas ma zhu ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsal bar zhu bar ma gyur pa'i zas la zas ma zhu ba zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: It is like undigested food.

original: de ltar byas na mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du cung zad shes pa yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar byas na mig gi rnam par shes pa nas lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du cung zad shes pa yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, it follows that one would have a slight knowledge of the eye consciousness up to the body consciousness,

original: bye brag yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one would not completely discriminate the specific characteristics.

original: nyon mongs pa @134b can ni mi bzad pa yin par thal par 'gyur te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa @134b can ni mi bzad pa yin par thal par 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that the afflicted would be unendurable,

original: phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they would be objects of observation that are distorted.

original: sems g-yengs pa'i shes pa ni las nus pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems g-yengs pa'i shes pa ni las nus pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: It follows that the consciousness of a distracted mind is not a cause of karma,

original: 'khrugs pa yin pa'i phyir ra //
analyzed: 'khrugs pa yin pa'i phyir ra //
translated: because it is disturbed.

original: yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni byis pa gzhon nu la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: yongs su ma rdzogs pa ni byis pa gzhon nu la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The incomplete refers to children and so on,

original: 'ga' zhig yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not completely discriminate anything.

original: mi gsal ba ni le lo dang rmugs pa dang gnyid la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: mi gsal ba ni le lo dang rmugs pa dang gnyid la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin te /
translated: The unclear refers to those concomitant with laziness, lethargy, sleep, and so on,

original: de dag gis de dag gsal bar yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis de dag gsal bar yongs su mi gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not clearly discriminate those objects.

original: de ltar 'dod na ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i bye brag kho na yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bstan pa de dag ni shes pa'i bye brag gzhan 'ga' zhig yin gyi sems ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod na ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i bye brag kho na yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bstan pa de dag ni shes pa'i bye brag gzhan 'ga' zhig yin gyi sems ni ma yin no //
translated: If you accept that, then what is called consciousness is only a particular kind of cognition.

original: ci nyes she na /
analyzed: ci nyes she na /
translated: What is the problem with that?

original: de'i phyir shes pa dang rnam par shes pa gnyis mtshungs par ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes smras te /🔽rdzas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir te shes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang yin /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa dang rnam par shes pa gnyis mtshungs par ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes smras te / rdzas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i phyir te shes pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang yin /
translated: Therefore, it is said that cognition and consciousness would not be associated.

original: rnam par shes pa yang yin pas so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang yin pas so //
translated: Because it contradicts the sameness of substance. Cognition is both the nature of wisdom and consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid sems yin gyi rnam par shes pa sems las byung ba yin par mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid sems yin gyi rnam par shes pa sems las byung ba yin par mi 'grub ste /

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

translated: The term consciousness is not subsumed in the aggregate of formation because the terms mind, thought, and consciousness are synonyms and are subsumed in the aggregate of consciousness.

original: 'du byed kyi phung por bsdus pa thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung por bsdus pa thob pa ma yin no //

original: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni rnam par shes pa yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: shes pa'i rang gi ngo bo ni rnam par shes pa yin par 'gyur la /

original: de yang rnam par shes pa'i phung por yin te /

original: de lta bu grub pa ni grub pa'i mtha' yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu grub pa ni grub pa'i mtha' yang ma yin no //
translated: Such a proof is not a tenet.

original: de bas na shes pa las rnam par shes pa rigs pa gzhan yin zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na shes pa las rnam par shes pa rigs pa gzhan yin zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, consciousness and cognition are different types of awareness.

original: sngon ma byung ba shes pa rnam par shes pa yin zhes bya ba ni med pa yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: sngon ma byung ba shes pa rnam par shes pa yin zhes bya ba ni med pa yin no zhes ston to //
translated: The statement “cognition is awareness of what was not previously known” is not tenable.

original: dper na bre las gzhal med khang dang zhes @135a * //
analyzed: dper na bre las gzhal med khang dang zhes @135a * //
translated: For example, a palace is not a measure.

original: bya ba ni sngon ma byung ba bre nyid gzhal med khang yin no zhes nges par byar mi rung ste /
analyzed: bya ba ni sngon ma byung ba bre nyid gzhal med khang yin no zhes nges par byar mi rung ste /
translated: It is not tenable to say that a previously non-existent measure is a palace.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: rigs tha dad pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: rigs tha dad pa nyid yin te /
translated: They are different types.

original: snod gang gis 'jal ba de ni bre dang bre'u chung la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: snod gang gis 'jal ba de ni bre dang bre'u chung la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The measure that measures a vessel is a measure, a small measure, and so on.

original: lha la sogs pa'i khang pa ni gzhal med khang ngo //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa'i khang pa ni gzhal med khang ngo //
translated: A palace is a house of gods and so on.🔽A monastery is like a string of pearls.

original: mu tig gi chun po las gtsug lag khang lta bu'o zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
analyzed: mu tig gi chun po las gtsug lag khang lta bu'o zhes bya ba ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of this?

original: rigs tha dad pa yin no zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rigs tha dad pa yin no zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: They are different types. This is the context.

original: sngon ma byung ba mu tig gi chun po nyid gtsug lag khang yin pa med de /
analyzed: sngon ma byung ba mu tig gi chun po nyid gtsug lag khang yin pa med de /
translated: The pearl necklace itself is not the temple.

original: mu tig gi chun po ni skud pas brgyus pa'i mu tig gi tshogs so //
analyzed: mu tig gi chun po ni skud pas brgyus pa'i mu tig gi tshogs so //
translated: A pearl necklace is a collection of pearls strung on a thread.

original: gtsug lag khang ni sdom brtson rnams kyi gnas yin no /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang ni sdom brtson rnams kyi gnas yin no /
translated: A temple is a place for those who are diligent in the vows.

original: ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba bstan zin to //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba bstan zin to //
translated: Name-and-form has already been explained.🔽The four great elements are the earth element, the water element, the fire element, and the wind element.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams rnams te zhes bya ba la khams smos pas ni kha dog dang dbyibs gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams rnams te zhes bya ba la khams smos pas ni kha dog dang dbyibs gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The elements are mentioned because they manifest color and shape.

original: sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sra ba dang gsher ba dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Their characteristics are solidity, liquidity, heat, and motion.

original: sra ba ni sa'i khams so //
analyzed: sra ba ni sa'i khams so //
translated: Solidity is the earth element.

original: gsher ba ni chu'i khams so //
analyzed: gsher ba ni chu'i khams so //
translated: Liquidity is the water element.

original: dro ba ni me'i khams so //
analyzed: dro ba ni me'i khams so //
translated: Heat is the fire element.

original: g-yo ba ni rlung gi khams te gsum ni rang gi ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid du bstan te /
analyzed: g-yo ba ni rlung gi khams te gsum ni rang gi ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid du bstan te /
translated: Motion is the wind element. Three are taught as characteristics by their intrinsic natures.

original: de mtshon par byed pas mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mtshon par byed pas mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are characteristics because they characterize those.

original: rlung gi khams ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: rlung gi khams ni nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan to //
translated: The wind element is taught to have the characteristic of supporting.

original: yang ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni rlung gi khams yin te //
analyzed: yang ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni rlung gi khams yin te //
translated: Lightness is the characteristic of the wind element,

original: de yang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is light.

original: yang ba nyid ni rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la yang yod de /
analyzed: yang ba nyid ni rgyur byas pa'i gzugs la yang yod de /
translated: Lightness exists in derivative form,

original: de bas na g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid ni rlung gi khams so zhes de'i las kyi bye brag tu byas te /
analyzed: de bas na g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid ni rlung gi khams so zhes de'i las kyi bye brag tu byas te /
translated: therefore, the wind element is characterized by movement, which is a particular activity of the wind element.

original: 'byung ba dang 'byung ba 'dus pa rnams yul gzhan du phyin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang 'byung ba 'dus pa rnams yul gzhan du phyin pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the cause of the movement of the primary elements and their products to another place.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni zhes rgyas par 'byung ba de la mig gi dbang po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'o zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni zhes rgyas par 'byung ba de la mig gi dbang po ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang ba'o zhes bya ba nas /
translated: The eye faculty is the clear form that is the basis of the eye consciousness.

original: lus kyi dang po ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: lus kyi dang po ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten gzugs dang pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: The body faculty is the clear form that is the basis of the body consciousness.

original: de'i yul yang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de'i yul yang zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Its object is also clear form.

original: de'i yul ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i yul zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i yul ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'i yul zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the expression “object of the eye sense-faculty” is the object of the eye sense-faculty.

original: de la gzugs ni sngon po la sogs par rnam pa bzhi dang / de dag gi rnam par dbye ba gyur pa gzhan yang ngo //
analyzed: de la gzugs ni sngon po la sogs par rnam pa bzhi dang / de dag gi rnam par dbye ba gyur pa gzhan yang ngo //
translated: Form is of four types: color, shape, manifestation, and spatial division.

original: kha cig ni gzugs rnam pa gnyis su brjod de kha dog dang dbyibs so //
analyzed: kha cig ni gzugs rnam pa gnyis su brjod de kha dog dang dbyibs so //
translated: Some say that form is of two types: color and shape.

original: @135b de la kha dog ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: @135b de la kha dog ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Color is as previously explained.

original: dbyibs ni rnam pa brgyad de /
analyzed: dbyibs ni rnam pa brgyad de /
translated: Shape is of eight types:

original: ring ba dang / thung ngu dang / gru bzhi dang / kun du dkyil 'khor dang / phyal le ba dang / phyal le ba ma yin pa dang / mthon po dang dma' ba'o //
analyzed: ring ba dang / thung ngu dang / gru bzhi dang / kun du dkyil 'khor dang / phyal le ba dang / phyal le ba ma yin pa dang / mthon po dang dma' ba'o //
translated: long, short, square, round, high, low, even, uneven.

original: mtshan nyid kyang yang rnam pa nyi shur brjod de /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyang yang rnam pa nyi shur brjod de /
translated: The characteristics of form are also said to be of twenty types:

original: ji ltar chos mngon pa mdzod pas 'byung ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar chos mngon pa mdzod pas 'byung ba bzhin no //
translated: as they are explained in the Abhidharmakośa.

original: sgra ni rnam pa brgyad de /
analyzed: sgra ni rnam pa brgyad de /
translated: Sound is of eight types:

original: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang / ma zin pa'i 'byung ba dang / sems can du ston pa dang / sems can du ston pa ma yin pa rnams yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'ong ba ma yin pa'i dbye bas rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba dang / ma zin pa'i 'byung ba dang / sems can du ston pa dang / sems can du ston pa ma yin pa rnams yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du 'ong ba ma yin pa'i dbye bas rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: The eight types of tangible objects are the four great elements, smoothness, roughness, heaviness, and lightness.

original: dri ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: dri ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four types of smell are

original: dri zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / dri mnyam pa dang / dri mi mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: dri zhim pa dang / dri nga ba dang / dri mnyam pa dang / dri mi mnyam pa'o //
translated: good smell, bad smell, equal smell, and unequal smell.

original: kha cig gsum du brjod do //
analyzed: kha cig gsum du brjod do //
translated: Some say there are three types:

original: dri zhim pa dang / dri zhim pa ma yin pa dang tha mal pa'o //
analyzed: dri zhim pa dang / dri zhim pa ma yin pa dang tha mal pa'o //
translated: good smell, bad smell, and neutral smell.

original: ro ni drug ste mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshva dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba'i dbye bas so //🔽reg bya ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi ma gtogs par rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: ro ni drug ste mngar ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tshva dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska ba'i dbye bas so // reg bya ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi ma gtogs par rnam pa bdun te /
translated: The six types of taste are sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter, and astringent.

original: 'jam pa nyid dang / rtsub pa nyid dang / yang ba nyid dang / dro ba nyid dang / bkres pa nyid dang / skom pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa nyid dang / rtsub pa nyid dang / yang ba nyid dang / dro ba nyid dang / bkres pa nyid dang / skom pa'o //
translated: The seven types of tangible objects are smoothness, roughness, heaviness, lightness, cold, hunger, and thirst.

analyzed: 'byung ba chen po ma gtogs par zhes smos pa ni rgyur byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase except for the great elements is used because this is a discussion of the characteristics of derivative form.

analyzed: yid kyi yul yang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi skye mched pa sdom pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //

analyzed: 'dir lus kyi dbang po dang / gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i phyogs gcig yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin pa 'dir mig la sogs pa ni de'i tshe mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //

original: lus kyi dbang po kho na yod de gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po kho na yod de gzhan ma yin no //

analyzed: sgra ni gnas skabs ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang / dri dang / ro nyi tshe ston gyi sgra ma yin no //

analyzed: ji ltar brjod par bya ji ltar na yang de las gzhan pa'i gzugs yin te / de tsam zhig rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis yin par grags par 'gyur gyi ming ni ma yin no //
translated: If you explain the compound as a tatpuruṣa, “name-and-form,” then how can you say that name is the condition of form?🔽The expression “name-and-form” would be reduced to mere words, just like the expressions “form-of-name,” “name-and-form,” “name-of-name.”🔽If you explain the compound as a tatpuruṣa, “name-and-form,” then how can you say that name is the condition of form?🔽The expression “name-and-form” would be reduced to mere words, just like the expressions “form-of-name,” “name-and-form,” “name-of-name.”

original: skyes pa'i skad cig ma phyi ma rnams ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ma yin nam zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni rgyu can yin la /
analyzed: skyes pa'i skad cig ma phyi ma rnams ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ma yin nam zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni rgyu can yin la /
translated: The second moment of the embryo, etc., is not the condition of name-and-form, but is itself conditioned by name-and-form.

original: de la skad cig ma dang po kho na'i rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin gyi skad cig ma gnyis pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la skad cig ma dang po kho na'i rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin gyi skad cig ma gnyis pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: The first moment of the embryo is conditioned by consciousness, but the second moment is not.

original: de dag kyang snga ma la brten nas 'byung ba yin pas /
analyzed: de dag kyang snga ma la brten nas 'byung ba yin pas /
translated: and they arise in dependence on prior states.

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ma yin nam /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ma yin nam /
translated: Are not name-and-form the condition of name-and-form?

original: ji ltar de dag rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis yin zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis yin zhes bya zhe na /
translated: How can they be the condition of consciousness?🔽The root text states:

original: rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan yan lag gi rkyen gyi dngos por ni 'dir brjod par bzhed pa ma yin gyi zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan yan lag gi rkyen gyi dngos por ni 'dir brjod par bzhed pa ma yin gyi zhes rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Here, it is not asserted that the other moment of the same type is the condition of the members.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo sde 'dir yan lag rnams kyi rang gi rigs rkyen gyi dngos por brjod par bzhed pa ma yin na ni skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo sde 'dir yan lag rnams kyi rang gi rigs rkyen gyi dngos por brjod par bzhed pa ma yin na ni skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por ma yin no //
translated: Here, in this sūtra on dependent origination, if it is not asserted that the members are the condition of the members, then the other moment of the same type is not the condition.

original: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then what is?

original: rigs dang mi mthun pa rkyen gyi dngos por yin no //
analyzed: rigs dang mi mthun pa rkyen gyi dngos por yin no //
translated: It is asserted that the condition is not of the same type.

original: yang na / rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos po ni rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen de'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: yang na / rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos po ni rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen de'i dngos po ste /
translated: Or else, the entity of the other conditions of the other moment of its own type is the entity of the other conditions of the other moment of its own type.

original: rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen gyi dngos po'o //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen gyi dngos po'o //
translated: The entity of the other conditions of the other moment of its own type.

original: yang na rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan la rkyen rnams kyi dngos po ni rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos po ste /
analyzed: yang na rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan la rkyen rnams kyi dngos po ni rang gi rigs skad cig ma gzhan rkyen gyi dngos po ste /
translated: Or else, the entity of the conditions of the other moment of its own type is the entity of the other conditions of the other moment of its own type.

original: de 'dir brjod par bzhed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'dir brjod par bzhed pa ma yin no //
translated: But this is not what is intended here.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,🔽since it is intended to express the entity of the other substantial entity with a distinction as a condition, it is taught that the first is the condition of arising.

original: khyad par can gyi rdzas gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por brjod par bzhed pa yin pas dang por skye ba nyid kyi rkyen yin par bstan @136b gyi zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rdzas gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can gyi rdzas gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por brjod par bzhed pa yin pas dang por skye ba nyid kyi rkyen yin par bstan @136b gyi zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi rdzas gzhan rkyen gyi dngos por gzhag pa yin no //
translated: The entity of the other substantial entity with a distinction is posited as the entity of the condition.

original: skyes pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen gyi dngos por gzhag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes pa'i rgyun gyi rkyen ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang gi rigs kyi skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen gyi dngos por gzhag pa ma yin no //
translated: This means that it is not posited as the condition of another moment of its own type.

original: de lta ma yin na ma rig pa yang ma rig pa'i rkyen yin par zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ma rig pa yang ma rig pa'i rkyen yin par zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: Otherwise, ignorance would be the condition of ignorance.

original: gal te skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen du rang gi rigs yin par brjod par bzhed par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma gzhan gyi rkyen du rang gi rigs yin par brjod par bzhed par gyur na ni /
translated: If it were asserted that another moment is the condition of its own type,

original: ma rig pa yang ma rig pa'i rkyen yin par brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma rig pa yang ma rig pa'i rkyen yin par brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur te /
translated: ignorance would have to be called the condition of ignorance.

original: 'di ltar ma rig pa thams cad ma rig pa'i rkyen yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma rig pa thams cad ma rig pa'i rkyen yin te /
translated: In that case, all ignorance would be the condition of ignorance,

original: ji skad du ma rig pa'i rkyen ni rang gi rigs yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du ma rig pa'i rkyen ni rang gi rigs yin te /
translated: because it is said, “The condition of ignorance is its own type.

original: rmongs pa kho na las de skye bar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rmongs pa kho na las de skye bar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: It arises only from delusion,” and so on.

original: rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen yin par ci zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen yin par ci zhe na /
translated: And consciousness would be the condition of consciousness.

original: brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: must be stated.

original: gal te skad cig ma gzhan gyi yan lag gi rkyen rang gi rigs yin par 'dir brjod par bzhed pas skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa nyid yin pas /
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma gzhan gyi yan lag gi rkyen rang gi rigs yin par 'dir brjod par bzhed pas skad cig ma gnyis pa la sogs pa gzhan gyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa nyid yin pas /
translated: If the condition of the other moment is the homogeneous immediate condition, then, since consciousness is the condition of the second moment, etc.,

original: 'du byed kyi dgos pa'i skad cig ma dang po ni 'og ma'i rkyen yin par brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi dgos pa'i skad cig ma dang po ni 'og ma'i rkyen yin par brjod par bya dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: the purpose of the formative forces must be stated to be the first moment.🔽Or else, if that is not so,

original: yang na de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rgyun skye ba'i rkyen yin par brjod par bzhed na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te rgyun skye ba'i rkyen yin par brjod par bzhed na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: if it is asserted that the condition is the arising of the continuum,🔽it is called name because it is a transformation.

original: 'gyur bas na ming zhes bya ste zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gyur bas na ming zhes bya ste zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the term “transformation.”

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag gis rgyun mi 'chad par de'i rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes smras te /
analyzed: dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag gis rgyun mi 'chad par de'i rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes smras te /
translated: it is said that “the continuum is transformed without interruption through the differences in objective support, aspect and differentiation.”

original: de la dmigs pa'i bye brag ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos rnams dmigs pa'i bye brag yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa'i bye brag ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos rnams dmigs pa'i bye brag yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The specific object is the specific object of form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects.

original: rnam pa'i bye brag ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: rnam pa'i bye brag ni gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid kyi sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag gis so //
translated: The specific mode is the specific mode of those forms, etc., as blue, yellow, etc.

original: rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag ni chung du dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag gis so //
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba'i bye brag ni chung du dang / 'bring dang / chen po'i rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag gis so //
translated: The specific classification is the specific classification of small, medium, and great natures.

original: yang na dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i bye brag gis yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Or else, it should be understood as the specific classification of wholesome, unwholesome, and undefined.

original: shi ste gzugs kyi lus bor nas //
analyzed: shi ste gzugs kyi lus bor nas //
translated: Having died, having abandoned the body of form,

original: zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni shi ste gzugs kyi lus 'di nyid bor ba skye ba gzhan gyi dngos por yongs su 'gyur ba yin no //
